name: Racing Karts
description: To finish first in racing karts you got one simple task ... drift into the corners, scratch the apex, boost out of it and finish first! Easy to learn but hard to master ! Compete in three different game modes namely time trial, arcade mode and championship. Customize your racing kart your way with unlocked parts starting from the pilots helmet, tires, exhaust ,wings and color. Get your couch ready for four player splitscreen arcade racing action and a ton of fun! Compete in breathtaking kart races in different game modes single or multiplayer ! Drift Boost Win thats kart racing!

name: WordFall
description: Make words using the letter tiles that drop down the grid. Used letters will disappear from the grid, and you're on a timer, so be quick! Play against other viewers, on stream, and battle for the highest score for the game and the season leaderboard.

name: Max Time Traveler: From the Future
description:
Max Time Traveler: From The Future Created By Steve The Producer

Play with Max, Donata and Steve The Producer and fight the monsters from the future, explore the spaceship and collect coins to survive, use the power-ups and get the best score!

name: To the Ones We Lost
description: To The Ones We Lost is an emotional storydriven adventure/horror singleplayer game about mental health. Main character seeks for answers to what happened with his best friend until things start to get weird and he begins to question his own mental health.

name: Minepull
description: More than just a puzzle game. Minepull highlights the fun part of puzzle-solving and brain teasers. Single Player Mode: Do you like solving puzzles while calculating your next move? Minepull gives you the perfect opportunity to taste that experience. Local Multiplayer Mode: Who does not like to challenge their friends and family on puzzle solving skills? With Local Multiplayer Mode you can challenge your friends and family with 2 different difficulty settings.

name: ONO: Brain Fog
description:
Think straight with a new kind of puzzle that relies on your most basic brain functions - motion & prediction. Beneath the words of Wordle. Below the math of Sudoku.
Start a chain reaction that will clear all the O's from the screen -> ONO (no O's).
Starting with the simplest forms + rules, complexity and variety emerge as elements are added. A fun easy way to work on your clarity, focus and working memory.

name: Crates n' Mohawks
description: Oi! Gun down and roll through waves of enemies in this arcade twin-stick shooter where surviving and collecting the highest number of gun crates is the only rule!

name: Tales of the Underworld: Legends of Primordial Sea
description: Uncompromising survival & Fantasy World Exploration: You play as Rain and Jonah, who enter the Underworld full of revenants, entities and surprises. combat with ninjas that match your survival style. Fight your way out as you unravel the secret of Jonah's plan.

name: Tether
description: Tether is an abstract arcade platformer about elastic connections and arcing flights. Swing and fly through 4 different game modes, in a peaceful, endless world.

name: Ms. Holmes: The Adventure of the McKirk Ritual - Collector's Edition
description: Old secrets rarely stay buried...

name: Cursed House
description: In the process of searching for real estate, he comes across a lucrative offer - a 2-storey house with a basement and an attic for only $295,000. After much hesitation, he contacts the seller and agrees to the deal. But what happened on the next day after the move, he was shocked.

name: Legendary Tales: Cataclysm
description: A dreadful prediction came to the oracle — the cataclysm is coming. The renegade witch is about to save the world or ruin it… “Legendary Tales: Cataclysm” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Endless Battlefield
description: Endless Battlefield is a competitive multiplayer online FPS game. It gives players the capacity to control various weapons and vehicles in the game.The FPS covers 6 modes: Conquest, Capture the Flag, Rush, Team Deathmatch, Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2
description: Mixx Island: Remix Vol. 2 is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush minigame!

name: Skeletal Skism
description: War has broken out between the undead... All for one sole purpose: to determine the One - True - Skeleton - King. Do you have what it takes to claim the crown?

name: Yokaiware
description: Face the scariest Yokai in this cursed collection of 28 fast-paced Microgames, each with a different mechanic, look, and feel!

name: Pink Elephant
description: Pink Elephant is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final of the game.

name: Blink: The Last Night
description: Will make you feel like you're going insane.

name: Worlds Within Worlds
description: A retro 2D platformer with an emphasis on variety and accessibility. Play solo, or invite a friend to lend a helping hand with a time-freezing Butterfly.

name: Clash of Chess
description: Our app is ideal for everyone. It contains 10 different levels of difficulty, over 400 challenges and a diverse set of boards and pawns to make the game even more enjoyable.

name: Project Pulse
description: A co-op rhythm action game taking the rhythm elements of combat and pulling them into a thematic world. Play with your friends as characters that represent Melody, Bass, Harmony, and Percussion. Fight your way through your city and complete missions to build different musical weapons!

name: Long Loot the King
description: Pac-Man inspired retro action horror game about a king, who has to face his own made horrors in the dungeons. All because of his greed and selfishness.

name: Melting of the Winter Gears
description: The night outside is harsh, but the warmth of good words and company will keep our spirits high. Here, the storm cannot reach. See how the snowflakes melt upon the window panes? How the wind dies with a whisper? It’s as if the whole world is going silent tonight. Silent for the story I’m to tell. The story of a Doll without memory, a cat without form, a soldier without family and a drifter without a home.

name: BlueAge
description: BlueAge is a brand new 32 map limit removing megawad made by Skronkidonk and @DCGRetrowave.This megawad was made in 1 1/2 years on and off & was tested on DSDADoom.Pistol start was made in mind and is designed for UV, but lower difficulties are implemented as well.

name: Lunic: Possession
description:
Somehow you managed to get trapped inside a school that has been abandoned since one terrible accident. Looks like in order to unlock the exit you need to put certain pictures inside frames. But who came up with this kind of challenge?

You need to find pictures that are hidden behind locked doors for which you need to find keys. Every playthrough everything is spawned differently.

name: Shades of Azure
description: This is a mapset with the following traits/gimmicks/whatever; All map titles are one word and end on the letter T, except for MAP32. The maps are primarily coated in blue, using textures from 32in24-15tex & OTEX. Some maps might have a semi-speedmap feel to them, with sparse detailing. Some maps are easy, some are hard; but all except two of them can be knocked out in less than 15-20 minutes.

name: 1 Bad Wad
description: 10 short, quick Boom speedmaps + 1 credits map with a solid colors theme

name: Doom 2: The Way We Remember It
description: The entire of Doom 2, including music, text, levels, and some graphics, but from memory. Even includes MAP33, plus 2 bonus maps.

name: Mega Man Wily's Conquest 2: Hyper Edition Turbo!
description:
This is a complete hack to a previously unfinished version by DragonEye Studios. The abandoned version had some great ideas and lots of potential, so the purpose of this project was to refine the problematic areas and complete the hack so that the player can play all the way to the end and finish the game.

List of features, additions and changes:

1) Increased the speed of Mega Man and the Mega Buster!
2) Wily-4 and other previously unfinished stages are now 100% complete!
3) Added new challenges to all of the stages!
4) Changed the entire soundtrack with great music by Blast Hornet, WINED, Tsukikuro, Hydrawisk, DARS, and 8-bit fan.
5) Changed various weapons mechanics and physics.
6) Changed boss AIs, HP, and boss room layouts for new challenges.
7) Changed damage amount from various weapons to different bosses.
8) Updated various sound effects and graphics.
9) Increased climbing speed.
10) Fixed and refined stages from enemy spams and poor layouts from the original version.
11) Lots of new additional changes to all of the stages.
12) Updated title screen, menu screens, texts, and ending credits.
13) Reduced amount of energy used for most weapons.
14) Various bug fixes.
15) And many more various additions and fixes.

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 3C
description: Sin descripción

name: Racing: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 3 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Baseball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 3 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Not Dream Syndrome
description: (not) Dream Syndrome is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Shiutsuki and explore her dreams.

name: Police Hot Pursuit
description: If you like the adventures and cars then Police Hot Pursuit is for you! Take a car or even a bike and let the adventure begins!

name: Dead End Aegis: Gaiden
description: A squad of magical girls are the Earth's only defense against an alien invasion.

name: Snakepit Larry
description: Help explorer Larry on an adventure full of challenges and dangerous creatures. - 1 Player - A giant map to navigate - 4 different levels to explore - A 16-bit style adventure

name: Nirvana: Game of Life
description: Play this life simulation as a soul traveling from body to body through the cycle of life, all while experiencing everything life has to offer and trying to break the cycle in order to reach Nirvana. Make your decisions with a simple swipe mechanics in hundreds of life situations in Nirvana Game of Life. Maintain a balance between your needs (money, health, popularity, and happiness) throughout your life. Beware as each choice can be your last one! Hurry up to gain as many experiences as you can, and ultimately, try to reach Nirvana. There are many ways to die, but you will always get another round with a new body to control. Will you be able to defeat The Creator and break the cycle of life? Be careful, a lost soul is going to contact you and promise you a way out - will you trust her?

name: Clarent Saga: Chronicles
description: A novel with great RPG turn based battles. A great entry point for newcomers!

name: D.I.R: Death is Random
description: Death is Random (DIR) is an entry-level post-apocalyptic RPG zombie randomizer with survival elements, auto-battle and replayability. The main objective is to find all needed vehicle parts to escape the city. All key items are shuffled across the seven maps and you need to explore every single one to grab resources and find the fastest way to get out.

name: Snowman Adventure
description: Snowman Adventure is a third-person platformer. In this cool game you play as John the snowman. You have to get through all the obstacles to complete this game. This game will give you unforgettable emotions of joy and fun. Play it with cheerful and perky music!

name: Angry Angry Shark
description: Play with friends against endless waves of man eater sharks.

name: Super Pickleball Adventure
description:
As an aspiring pickleball champion, you've got to work your way up the ranks. Explore the world and defeat enemies with unique styles to get to the top! Think you can dethrone the pickleball GOAT?

The fast-paced sports game was created by Andrfw. The game came out near the end of 2022 and has already become one of the most popular pickleball games online.

name: Aurorae Equitas
description: Slightly over-the-hill capybaras Rubina and Ceferino, a pair of old acquaintances, meet up at a rental cabin near the end of the year for the Aurorae Equitas, a recurring natural event that happens once every few decades. They quickly realize that no one else from their social group is showing up, they try to make the best of an awkward social situation and reminisce on their tangentially shared history while sharing a warm fire and a calming hot spring.

name: Spunky
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of GEML: Awakening
description: Sin descripción

name: Rockman X3: New Year 2022
description: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2022, Year of the Tiger.

name: Paladins: Season 4 Champions Bundle
description:
Instantly unlock all six Champions released in Season 4 for one low price!

This bundle contains Champion unlocks for Yagorath, Octavia, Vatu, Rei, Saati, and Azaan.

Plus, you'll get an Emote, MVP, and unlocked Talents for all six Champions!

name: Dinosaur Era
description: Let's fight the dinosaurs ! With a powerful water jet stream, this game will give the players an amazing new water shooting experience.

name: Scrolls of Fire
description:
Seek power in the depths of the dungeon!
There are 2 floors filled with unique enemies and bosses to defeat.

You can also find scrolls that you can mix and match to upgrade your attacking capabilities, but dying means starting from square one.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Adventure Sonic
description:
Features:
- Easy to digest physics and moveset taking the best from Sonic Adventure 1 and 2!
- Outstanding support for controllers and simple mode. Give it a try on SA-Sonic and be surprised! (NOTE: Bind "Center Camera" to a comfortable button, you might prefer it over manual camera turning!)
- A fleshed out super form, custom NiGHTS moveset, many easter eggs, and deep-rooted mechanics hardcore fans will instantly recognize!
- A custom Adventure menu for cosmetical and accessibility options!
After around a year of work, Adventure Sonic (AKA SA-Sonic!) is complete! SA-Sonic heavily alters the game's physics to resemble Adventure 1 and 2's, whilst scaling everything to still feel good within an SRB2 context.

Sonic has more turning control and air resistance like in Adventure, and much stronger interactions with slopes! SRB2 normally encourages you to stay airborne to keep your speed and zoom over obstacles, but SA Sonic is instead at his fastest on the ground!

Adventure Sonic supports all control styles! (strafe, standard, & simple) Normally SRB2 prioritizes keyboard+mouse, with controllers being a massive self-induced handicap. But SA-Sonic was designed with a controller-play in mind, as that's what comes to mind for us when we think "3D Sonic platformer". The primary goal was to make Adventure Sonic control naturally for both casual players and SRB2 physics loyalists both. Here's hoping we achieved that goal!

name: Pixel Pro Baseball
description:
Pixel Pro Baseball is an addicting retro-style version of America's Pastime. It features simple controls, realistic physics and in depth data, all wrapped up in beautiful pixel-art.
Pick up and complete a quick game with a few minutes. Or, start a Dynasty and take your team to the major league final - manage your roster, trade players and tweak your line up for your next opponent.

name: Fight the Dracula!
description:
Fight the Dracula is a 2D Action Game where you fight Dracula. The gameplay itself is inspired by "I wanna be the Boshy" and or Mega Man.

You enter the stairway to Draculas' throne room where encouraging horses will tell you words of encouragement and sometimes gameplay hints. The fight itself is a high focus combat where you have to swiftly react to Draculas moves and hit him in the head (like in Castlevania) until he falls and dies!

The fight requires high focus and concentration as the smallest slip up can and will cause a untimely demise to the player character.

name: Zoinho in the Garden of Fools
description: Zoinho in the Garden of Fools is an isometric adventure about a chubby and friendly cyclops named Zoinho who got lost in the not very relaxing and a bit macabre Garden of Fools, where nature is almost never your friend and the supernatural is present at all times.

name: Half-Earth Socialism
description: Try your hand as a global planner of a future society. Play with a wide range of technologies and policies spanning different fields and ideologies. Will you lead the world to ecological utopia or planetary ruin?

name: Time Travel
description: Sin descripción

name: Amos Green's Final Repose
description: Amos Green's Final Repose is the 17th adventure of Carol Reed by MDNA, a young woman from England living in Sweden. Carol is contacted by her best friend Stina, because her contact infos were found on a dead man, whose body was discovered in a newly reopened part of a natural reserve. She doesn't know him, so Carol is tasked to find the connection...

name: Kotonoha Tango
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallen London: Adornment
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for January, 2022.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 4
description: The project tries to update and remodel the game Dragon Ball Z Budokai Tenkaichi 3 created by the Spike company with the new content that has appeared from Dragon Ball from 2007 to 2018, trying to be as faithful as possible to what the original creators were trying to achieve. representing the franchise in this frenetic game that simulates the most iconic fights of Anime.

name: The House of Closed Doors
description: The House of Closed Doors is a game in which you are locked in a mysterious house. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a dark old mansion. Explore mysterious rooms, collect various items, try to find a way out and stay alive.

name: Mini Golf RPG
description:
Fight dangerous monsters in an epic turn-based RPG - one golf stroke at a time.
Explore an RPG dungeon like never before by golfing your team to victory. Encounter themed enemies after every shot and stronger bosses after completing a hole. Fighting side by side with your team of caddies, can you grow strong enough to return peace to the mini-golf world?

name: Mirror Lover
description: The beautiful girl trapped in the mirror is waiting for you to rescue her. Or, are you the one trapped......?

name: Operation Sexy Sudoku
description: Solve puzzles to release two dimensional girls from their misty curse. Gather your team of mental gymnasts to aid you on your quest. Unlimited variations of sudoku puzzles.

name: Perfect Balance
description: A minimalist physics simulation game about balancing weights of different shapes and sizes on a tilting platform. Simple controls let you drag and drop weights wherever you choose, and upgrades will make the balancing easier.

name: 8 Bit Son-of-a-Bitch
description: Video game created by and featuring the punk band Wolf-Face. Help Michael J. Wolf make it to the basketball game on time, while also capturing the heart of his true love Boof. Avoid and destroy the maniacal Owen and Lars to save the town.

name: Evilmun Family: Season 3
description: Sin descripción

name: The Godkiller: Chapter 1
description: Puzzle adventure game set in the afterlife. The Godkiller - Chapter 1 is designed by Erik Hermansen, creator of Deadly Rooms of Death, and shares that series' top-down turn-based gameplay. Puzzles are variations on Sokoban-like block-pushing gameplay featuring several unusual mechanics (e.g. dying to respawn the player character in a more favourable position). The storyline follows a newly-dead soul contending with God's plans, and features several original songs with vocal performances.

name: Ministry of Pandemic
description: Ministry of Pandemic is a strategy and simulation game that forces social and economic balance during the pandemic. Formulate your strategy for survival while keeping all aspects of society steady.

name: Operation Airsoft
description: Operation Airsoft is an online first-person shooter based on the popular sport of airsoft. Choose from a library of real-life field layouts, including SpeedQB, Speedsoft, and Milsim gamestyles. Join Operation Airsoft and take advantage of the regular content updates that give a better feel for the game.

name: Lady Bug Arcade
description:
It's dinnertime and Lady Bug is hungry! Guide her around the garden collecting flowers and hearts while avoiding the deadly insects trying to make *her* their dinner!

Luckily, the garden is equipped with many revolving doors that the lady bug can use to block the enemy's attack or steer them into the deadly poison.

Scattered throughout the scene are letters that can be used to spell EXTRA for a bonus lady bug or SPECIAL for a visit to the VEGGIE BOUNTY and a chance to feast in the all-you -can-eat harvest!

GOOD LUCK!

name: Tomb of the Endless
description:
You are trapped in the Tomb of Unkhdar, and while searching for something lost you will find unworldly artifacts, uncover long forgotten truths and succumb to incomprehensible hidden things. But if you live, may what you find be worth the price.

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft "The Nameless City" and other books, Tomb of the Endless mixes the gameplay of a retro 2D adventure platformer with a Lovecraftian survival horror story.

Made for "Call of the Jam 2021".

name: Beowulf Classic
description: After killing Cain's descendant Grendel, Beowulf embarks on a task to kill the last monster of the land, Grendel's own mother! Embark on an adaption that mixes retro platforming and combat while you explore the old Beowulf Poem.

name: The TET Offensive
description: You are a Viet Cong during the Tet Offensive, a massive surprise attack that changed the course of the Vietnam War. Your objective is to take the American's Base, you can stealth your way by digging tunnels and avoiding detection, or release all bullets from your AK-47 into the enemy, the way you conquer the Base is your choice, but remember... there are consequences.

name: A Hunt for the Fae Folk
description: While strolling about in the woods you've stumbled into another realm. It's denizens are mischievous and their pranks are plenty. You are tasked with finding 5 hidden Easter Eggs in order to regain your freedom.

name: Dread in Deep Voyage
description: You are a Scuba Machinist, working for the largest Aquatic Theme Park in the world. It is your job to perform maintenance on a long abandoned attraction known as 'Deep Voyage'. Who knows what lurks down there...?

name: The Gentleman's Gold
description: When the sunken treasure beckons from deep below, will you answer the call? Follow the trail to the gold of the Gentleman.

name: Midnight Grove
description: Tecgothica's Midnight Grove is an Apple II style action-adventure game developed by riotjayne using the MonoGame framework.

name: What Girls Do in the Dark
description: This little game is based off one of the greatest fears I had as a teenage girl: showing up late to a stranger's slumber party. The rest of it is just extra. A short, text-based horror game.

name: Please Don't Feed the Creatures of the Deep
description: Use your trusty potato gun to feed the local wildlife. Horror-themed low-poly shooter set by the sea.

name: Hidden Celtics
description: Sin descripción

name: A Mole in Space
description: Embark on a short space journey to fix Moley's Spaceship and help him to continue his space expeditions. Three fully fleshed tough levels that will challenge your gaming skills. Unlock new powers as you progress and find more ship parts. This very short hack doesn't save and has infinite lives. Are you up to the challenge?

name: MinQ
description: MinQ is an RPG in which a rogue invades the Demon Lord’s castle and defeats monsters and heroes, taking items and defeating the Demon Lord.

name: Crazy Candy
description: Crazy Candy is a Card Game similar to Crazy 8's. Big Difference is that you play Solo.

name: Libertarian Wario Land
description: Sin descripción

name: GoombaGotchi
description:
A simple game where you play as a Goomba and collect PowerUps.

You must collect the GOOD PowerUps. The one chosen throughout the Goomba evolution family tree. Avoid the BAD PowerUps. The Poison Mushrooms are to be avoided.
Collect over 15 GOOD PowerUps to continue to the next evolution. Every time a GOOD PowerUp is collected it adds to your score. Every time a Bad PowerUp is collected it lessens your score. Every round of the game is more and more difficult. Every lower branch on the Goomba family tree is more difficult.

Will you survive?

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Hex
description: What's this? Your Girlfriend's father is making an award show and you're invited? Seems like nothing can go wrong! Besides that, a familiar face appears. It's Hex! Your robotic lookin' fella from before seems to have a performance scheduled during the event and he asks for your help. With the whole country watching you, people you fought before, and your Girlfriend, there's no way you could lose!

name: Polyphony
description: A hybrid Standard/Kaizo Super Mario World ROMhack.

name: Westen House
description: Sin descripción

name: Aggretsuko Office Rush
description: Help Retsuko overcome her days at work. Balance between managing requests and completing your workload. Don’t forget to keep that rage under control!

name: Guitar Hero Barões da Pisadinha
description: Guitar Hero Barões da Pisadinha is an unlicensed game from Brazil that is a rom hack of Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock featuring songs from the band Barões da Pisadinha.

name: Gravibots
description: Sin descripción

name: Sega Flipper
description: Sin descripción

name: Fontemon
description: Fontemon is a Pokémon parody, made with a game engine inside a font. This means the game runs wherever you can install and choose a font. The game is structured akin to a "choose your own adventure".

name: Luigi Floating on an Egg Over the Sea
description: Enjoy a relaxing ride across the sea with all of your favorite friends.
A 2048 port for Vircon32.

name: Basic Platformer
description: A platformer with puzzle elements made for the Vircon32 virtual console.

name: 3rees
description:
3rees is a homebrew game which is an adaptation of 2048 with added extra rules.
There are 3 game modes: 768 which is to acheive score of 768 as fast as possible, Long which is obtaining as high score as possible until maximum limit reached, and Time where you have 3 minutes to gain as much score as you can.

name: The Last Plast
description: A remake to Xonix made with Claymation to bring a whole new experience.

name: The Mandalorian: Chapter 3 - The Sin
description: Sin descripción

name: Klondike Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Fight And Cadillacs 2
description: Created by Pablo Vera, this is a crossover of Capcom's two most nostalgic beat'em up games: Final Fight and Cadillacs & Dinosaurs. Two universes collide in this awesome adventure.

name: Blood Servants
description: Go it alone or bring your friends as you slash, burn, and loot your way through dungeons in a near-endless quest for power!

name: The Dating Game
description:
The Dating Game is a 1-bit memory puzzle game in the style of a dating simulator!
Created by Acerola apart of Ludwig's 2021 Game Jam.

name: The Little Match Girl, by Hans Christian Andersen
description: In The Little Match Girl by Hans Christian Andersen, a little girl is forced to sell matches on the street in the cold of New Year's Eve.

name: Kubo 1 & 2
description: Kubo 1 & 2 is a compilation that contains the first two Kubo games.

name: Arkade Rush
description: A game of fast paced cooperative mayhem, as you work to keep an arcade running.

name: No One Is Watching You
description: Point-and-Click-Adventure about the intrusiveness of being watched in your own Home

name: Summoner Wars Online
description: Summoner Wars Online is a videogame about tactical fantasy battles using cards. It was adapted from the physical board game Summoner Wars: Second Edition (released 2021), by Plaid Hat Games.

name: The Witcher 3: Enhanced Edition - Redux
description: The Witcher 3 Enhanced Edition is a total overhaul mod for The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. It aims to enhance the game's experience by revamping combat, alchemy, economy, character progression and other mechanics. It introduces changes to make the game more challenging and realistic.

name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 19
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 17
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 16
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 15
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Party Legacy 1 Vol. 14
description: Sin descripción

name: F-Theta
description: Top-down screen-rotating racing game.

name: Vs Suicide Mouse
description: Vs Suicide Mouse is a mod by gamepro_25. It is based on the creepypasta "suicidemouse.avi".

name: Ninjish Guy in Low-Res World
description:
You don't know how. You don't know why. All you know is you are in the depths of a strange facility.

The path in front of you is a dangerous path. But it's the only path available.

So it begins...

Ninjish Guy in Low-Res World is a platform game where you have to jump, slide and stomp your way through more than forty labyrinthine screens plagued with enemies, fire, sharks and other hazards, plus some tough bosses that will try to destroy you.

Climb ropes and stairs, swim in dangerous waters, collect keys to open doors, find hidden hearts and especially try survive all the dangers that lurk in Low-Res World.

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project
description:
Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project (commonly known as RAMP) was a mapping event held in June and July 2021 by David Newton (DavidN) aimed at encouraging newcomers to try mapping for Doom, much like the Doom Upstart Mapping Project which inspired this project. Mappers of all skill levels and experience were welcome to participate and were allowed to map in any map format, with the entire project being tied together using GZDoom and maps being loaded from a hub level. Mappers submitted their maps to a site created specifically for the project by DavidN, which included a new tool to automatically compile new maps into the project as they were uploaded to the site.

This project has 209 maps.

name: Sandstorm!
description: You are Josué Jorge and you have time-traveled to the ancient world of Egypt in search of the Crowns of Power. They are hidden inside the labyrinthine and macabre Great Pyramids and guarded by powerful deities. Now, our hero must face unexpected dangers such as giant spiders, poisonous snakes, and, if that’s not enough, time itself because if the countdown reaches zero, he will be forever stuck in the past….

name: Infinite Pinball
description: Give wiiings to your flippers and fly past the levels in this boundless pinball arcade.

name: System City
description: A platformer set in the world inside your computer! Help the citizens of hardware and software city keep the machines operational.

name: Strip in Love
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: OrderZero
description:
You are a pretty girl who received an unknown mission.
You've crashlanded in the middle of nowhere, and all communication is down.
With just one single weapon, you must make your way out of this place overflowing with enemies. Be careful, as you will have to start from the very beginning if you fail.

name: Idle Mining Company
description: This miner game is an idle simulation game where you can invest to become a rich capitalist millionaire businessman. The aim of this gold digging game is to develop your mining empire by making investments to get as much cash and idle cash as possible.

name: Annihilation: Space Tycoon
description: The fate of the Multiverse is in your hands! If you like comics, science, adventure and idle clickers we have great news for you! Even if you like capitalist tycoon idle games it's definitely for you!

name: Royelles - Gaming For Girls
description: Royelles is a virtual universe created specifically for girls and non-binary individuals, where play has been redefined. Royelles game play is anchored in a collection of the fiercest female personas, that inspire you to create, connect, learn and most importantly, have FUN - by simply being yourself.

name: Solemn
description: A boy ventures off into the woods to find his missing friend.

name: Pac-Man 12-in-1 Legacy Series
description: Pac-Man 12-in-1 Legacy Series is an arcade machine bundle by Arcade1Up that features various arcade games from Namco.

name: Sunrise Village: Farm Game
description: Explore a peaceful village surrounded by nature  Help your grandfather with handling a farm  Meet friendly villagers  Dive into exciting mysteries along your way

name: Meteor Hunt Idle
description: Join our crew, mine meteors, build a base, fight space pirates, and make your wallet as fat as the moon!

name: Plaguemon: Kado
description: Plaguemon: Kado is a ROM hack that serves as a sequel to Plaguemon: Lost Diaries, which is a fan-made hack of the original Pokémon Red game. Plaguemon: Kado is based on Pokémon Trading Card Game.

name: Idle Ocean Cleaner Eco Tycoon
description: Join players to help the planet by Cleaning up its Oceans! A brand new in idle tycoon games - a free clicker game. Take role of recycle coach cleaner and gold miner simulator to rescue the planet from eco trash. Build your garbage cleaning team and save the planet in one of the most exciting ocean explorer ecology games.

name: Judgment Day: Angel of God
description: It is Judgment Day and here you are. OMG! As the Angel of God, you are in charge of judgment on the reckoning day! It is your mission, you are in charge of judging and determining all souls’ afterlife destiny! Play the best of heaven or hell games.

name: Idle Power
description: Your systems have come online. Your programming directs you to generate as much energy as possible, by any means necessary. Spin the gear handles, sell your energy to the grid, and invest money to build up your infrastructure as you expand to ever-increasing heights. The world, and indeed the universe, will find out just what happens when an artificial intelligence is given a single task: Maximize yourself at all costs.

name: Idle Ghost Hotel
description:
Welcome to the resting place for cute ghosts!
Develop your haunted hotel with simple taps!
You can progress quickly in this hotel tycoon game.

name: Space Takeover: Over City
description: Conquer the world and strategize all the states io! Towers or states, all will be conquered!

name: Rizline
description:
Presenting Pigeon Games' second enchanting music rhythm game, following the success of "Phigros"!
Dive into a mesmerizing journey where points and lines dance in harmony, weaving an extraordinary geometric tapestry set to the innermost beat of your heart!

name: Asphalt 9 Legends Arcade
description: Tear up the asphalt and take on the world’s top drivers to become the next racing legend in the most thrilling arcade racing simulator available. Asphalt 9 Legends Arcade puts you behind the wheel of high-end supercars from the world’s most renowned car brands and manufacturers, such as Porsche, Lamborghini, W Motors, and many more. Drive, boost and perform stunts across dynamic real-life locations in single or multiplayer modes as you compete on global leaderboards, and work your way to collecting all 20 racing machines. With heart-pumping action and jaw-dropping graphics, no other racing game can compete.

name: Luggage Retrieval Officer
description: You begin your career as a Trainee, retrieving the boring bags of coach ticket holders when their luggage goes amiss. But before long you will work your way to being a highly ranked member off staff retrieving important missing luggage for the likes of the Natural History Museum, NASA and even the FBI!

name: ReCaptcha V4
description: A parody ReCaptcha in which you play chess against an AI to prove you are not a robot.

name: The Lightkeeper
description: You've decided to take up a job offer as a lightkeeper. You'll be there for a month, and you'll have a partner so you don't go insane. All you have to do is man the light and the foghorn, nothing could go wrong, right?

name: Go Fly a Kite
description: A game about going to fly a kite and what would bring someone to do such a thing.

name: Stickman Archer Online
description: Stickman Archer is an action PvP battle game where you can fight with other stickmen and prove you're the best.

name: Lis: Achados & Perdidos dos Confins do Universo
description: How sharp are your organization skills? It’s time to discover!

name: Toca Pisadinha
description: Toca Pisadinha is a web game centered around the music of the band Os Barões da Pisadinha.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate Online Puzzle
description: Sonic Colors: Ultimate Online Puzzle is an interactive puzzle game by Nintendo made to promote Sonic Colors: Ultimate.

name: Brickscapes: Bricks Breaker
description: Relax your mind with Brick Breaker Game. Start the new adventure of a bricks game! it is simple to play and fun to keep challenging yourself with new bricks.

name: Gotris
description: Gotris is the impossible mix of the ancient game of GO and the mighty Tetris. Surround pieces from one colour with the ones of the other colour in order to clear them and earn points!

name: Wikipedia Speedruns
description: The rules of this game are simple. You'll be given a starting Wikipedia article and an ending Wikipedia article. Your goal is to navigate from the starting article to the ending article using only the article links.

name: Knorrig the Gifted Troublemaker
description: Who said having a pet piggie is a bad idea? Well, you did. Just now. It's 10 minutes before the festive dinner and you find yourself in a pickle thanks to your pet. Or should we say 'pigle'. The lovely gift for your sister is gone. Will you manage to get it back in time?

name: Otteretto
description: A game about palindromes (and otters).

name: AwakeMUD
description:
AwakeMUD is a MUD set in the year is 2064, and the world has been reforged in the fires of magic, technology, and greed. Orks, Trolls, Elves, and other races straight out of fantasy roam the streets, along with new and unfamiliar mutations inflicted on the populace in a traumatic event known as the SURGE. Cybernetic implants and arcane workings grant incredible power to those who can afford to wield them, and information - the most valuable resource in 2064– is stolen and traded by expert hackers with homemade VR rigs. Dominating this landscape are the mega-corporations, wielding nigh-limitless political clout and conducting shadow wars while an unsuspecting populace happily consumes their products.

As a Shadowrunner, you are one of the freelance agents hired to do various organizations' dirty work (and turn a healthy profit in the process). There are many paths you can take on your road to success, and many ways you can grow in power and influence in the Seattle community.

name: PunBall
description: This story takes place in a once barren land, where Zeus created civilization. Over time, Zeus grew lazy and an evil Shade appeared and wreaking havoc, bringing waves of evil to all.

name: Cannon World: Target
description: Casual puzzle shooting

name: Shing!: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gamma64
description: Gamma 64 is a ROM Hack created by iProgramInCpp, with 72 Stars.

name: LOL: Hasse toh Phasse x Pac-Man
description: LOL - Hasse toh Phasse x Pac-Man (sometimes shortened to just "LOL Pac-Man") was a game released in 2021, based on an Amazon Prime video series. It was a very poor quality version of Pac-Man, where the player controlled one of ten "Hasse toh Phasse" cast members' heads.

name: Pac-Man Giant Joystick
description: An extremely large joystick standing roughly two feet tall, with Pac-Man himself as the joystick's top. Gamelist is identical to Pac-Man Collection.

name: Tiny Arcade: Atari 2600
description: Sin descripción

name: Veins
description: A malignancy spreads through her veins.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker Multiplayer
description: A mod which adds the ability to play in multiplayer (up to 4 players) in The Wind Waker.

name: Mischief Makers Online
description: A mod which allows online multiplayer while playing Mischief Makers. This mod needs an application called ModLoader64 to work.

name: Drive Master: Simple Operation
description: Sin descripción

name: Ekika Queen's Iand
description: This is a horror-comedy youth violence novel game.

name: Banjo-Kazooie Online
description: A Banjo-Kazooie mod that adds online compatibility through ModLoader64.

name: Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix Deluxe
description:
Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix is a full game overhaul based off of Super Mario Bros.
With a faithful replication of the NES art style and original music based off of Koji Kondo's work, this mod will have you feeling the Mario groove!

name: Whack A Tako
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic CD: Episode Metal
description: A mod that adds Metal Sonic and Amy Rose to Sonic CD as playable characters, with their own movesets and changes to the story scenes, bosses and more.

name: Snolf: Tournament Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Brutal Minecraft Eternal
description: Brutal Minecraft Eternal (BM) - a modification developed on the second Doom engine, using the ports (Gzdoom and Zandronum). The mod has a characteristic style of the game Minecraft, with a lot of blood.

name: Brutal Hexen RPG
description: This is the continuation of Sergeant Mark IV's Brutal Hexen mod. Well, after been seemingly abandoned for a few years, we have continued Brutal HeXen where Sarge and Seidolon has left off.

name: SM64EX Coop
description:
Online multiplayer mod for Super Mario 64 EX that synchronizes all entities and every level for multiple players.

The project was discontinued and a new community-mantained fork SM64 Coop Deluxe is its official continuation.

name: Super Mario 64: Odyssey Mario's Moveset
description: A mod for Super Mario 64 PC Port which adds the movement mechanics from Super Mario Odyssey, as well as new collectibles and playable characters.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Forever
description: Based on the recent decompilation of the mobile version, Sonic the Hedgehog Forever adds a number of abilities, options, and game modes to enhance the experience and celebrate the replayability of the game.

name: The Lion King: Legacy Cartridge Collection
description: Limited Edition of 2000 packages with a brand-New playable SNES-Compatible Cartridge of The Lion King.

name: Mitos
description:
Solve the puzzle of decomposition
Dead things don't disappear by themselves. Millions of microscopic organisms live and die to perform one of nature's most common acts. The body of a recently deceased rat is on the menu and you are here to take part in the feast.

Split microbes in two! Splitting divides them but they are strong and capable when they work together.
Attack and destroy your enemies!
Push things around as you see fit! If your enemies get crushed in the process, all the better!
A microbe's life is short and limited, make sure to spend it wisely.

name: Zio and the Magic Scrolls
description:
Magic Scrolls allow even ordinary humans to use magic!
You too can become the world's strongest wizard as long as you have the magic scrolls created by Zio!

name: Super Mario 64: Shadow Edition
description:
Super Mario 64: Shadow Edition is ROMhack/mod of Super Mario 64 that replaces Mario with Shadow, changing the gameplay style to be similar as the gameplay seen in the Sonic Adventure series.

Shadow can run much faster, run over the water and do recognizable techniques such as the Homing Attack, the Spin Dash. When in water, Shadow can't swim, he jumps infinitely instead.

Shadow can also go Super and the player can change the damage system to that of Mario 64 or that of the Sonic series.

name: Portal Maze 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Panel de Pon GB Restoration
description: Panel de Pon GB Restoration is a ROMhack/mod of Pokémon Puzzle Challenge which intends to restore the game to its original concept of being a game in the Panel de Pon series.

name: LandCombat: Ren
description: It's a strategy game that focuses on ground war. Various units (armed vehicles, tanks, self-propelled guns, anti-tank rockets!) You can also use smoke bombs, charge mines, and turbo engines. Manage resources, facilities, R&D, heroes. If the security of the city is bad, there may be a riot.

name: Canceled! Super Puzzles Dream
description: Puzzles move onto the next level with ‘Super Puzzle Dream’, a mix between classic jigsaw and a ‘Tetris’-style dynamic mechanic. Two levels of play, 'senior' and 'junior', guarantee hours of entertainment for all. Become an expert and finish the puzzles in the shortest possible time and you will find yourself amongst the best in the world on the online leaderboard. You can also play with friends and family in the one-on-one split-screen competition mode. Your rival won't make it easy for you!

name: Hunters' Path: Rebirth
description: Hunters' Path: Rebirth is an on-foot shooter, pitting a ragtag but devout squad of Knights, Outlaws, Mages, and Samurai against the evils of a fantasy world full of destroyable scenery.

name: One-Hit Wonder
description: One-Hit Wonder is a short visual novel written in Catalan language, the first of its kind. Our protagonist joins a young man called Ismael in his nocturnal journey through a cyberpunk Barcelona... and down memory lane.

name: Dungeon Ikusa
description: It is an RPG where you build and defend dungeons and invade continents. Use intricate passageways, traps, and powerful fighters to fight off the threat of adventurers.The goal of the game is to expand the dungeon and protect the treasury.

name: Soul Fantasy
description: The white colossus fell from the sky, and the Demon Led Countless Demons to destroy all good things. For the future of the planet, for the belief in their hearts, five girls from different places, with different identities gathered together, embarked on the road to the demon king.

name: Caveman Hunt
description: Caveman hunt - hunt dinosaurs of the ancient world in this platformer with shooter elements. Shoot dinosaurs from primitive times to gain as much meat as possible for your tribe

name: Cute Chess
description: Cute Chess is all the fun of regular chess but with cute little characters, scene designs and music to make the game even more fun. Improve your chess skills by practising against computers with a range of different difficulties or take your skills online and compete against others.

name: Chinese Driving Test Simulator
description: Are you ready to take on the challenge of the Chinese driving test? For which it will test your skill of driving, knowledge of vehicle and traffic rules. The Chinese Driving Test Simulator will show you a complete, realistic Chinese driving test experience.

name: Agent Stilus
description: Agent Stilus is a 2D side-scrolling platformer shooter. Omega Corp creates implants and chips for implantation into people.

name: Peculiar Tales of Mid-Lake Pavilion
description: On a sultry night in late August, I ran into a man carrying a peony lantern at the Mid-Lake Pavilion. In the hazy and dim light, the man told the odd and bizarre stories. Under the overcast rainy sky, the moon setting horizontally, you will be brought into a perplexing, weird, and supernatural world

name: After a Long Journey
description:
Year 3999 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

the planet was supposed to be empty...

name: Painturio
description:
paintur.io is a free online multiplayer game where players have to guess the word that is drawn by one of them within a limited time. The principle is very simple, so it is possible to have fun with the whole family or a group of friends.

This game allows you to showcase your drawing skills, while using your overflowing imagination. Faster you are, more points you earn and you win the game!

The game is playable on any device which can access to internet.

name: Futbol Break
description: Sin descripción

name: Necrow Co.
description: Necrow Co. is a short platformer made for GBJam9.

name: Dig Dug Revival
description:
This game is a homage to Dig Dug, an arcade game developed by Namco in 1982.

In this version, except the first one, the playfields are generated randomly.

name: Underground Bundle: Dungeon Adventure and Miners Races
description: Exploring massive dungeons with the hope of getting out alive and eliminating all the enemies from Dungeon Adventure and dynamic and full of fun multiplayer modes from Miners Races. Grab Underground Bundle right now and engage yourself in the most exciting and rewarding game experience!

name: Fewar-DVD
description:
A rapid arcade game
Avoid the swords
Find the key
Enter the portal

name: At Home Alone Final
description: A leisure healing mini-pixel plot game exploring at home. Players will wander at home from the perspective of a little girl. What will she do when she is alone? What strange stories will be encounters in this process? During the exploration, maybe... you can even find some weird secrets?

name: Sulka
description:
Help Sulka find a new home!
A game made in 60 hours with 20 tiny levels to solve!

name: Revenants
description:
Become a professional occult investigator, relying on your cutting edge technology from 2030 to locate, trap and battle demonic forces, all whilst solving the mystery of the occult crimes.

You'll need a sharp eye to locate evidence throughout each case, documenting all you can find with your camera whilst you explore the abandoned crime scenes. As a professional investigator, you'll also need to put the case together, connecting the dots and discovering who the culprits were.

Choose which technology you want to take on each case. Do you want to hunt down the revenant and trap it? Or set up surveillance and sensors so you can stay away from it. Either way, you'll always have your trusty tablet at your side, allowing you to picture any evidence you find and keep demonic forces at bay.

This is no regular camera, the Pentacam was built using ancient ritual magics. The demons should be afraid of you as you charge up the Pentacam and manifest them further with each shot. Until they are eventually captured within the device.

Revenants will be released in an episodic / case structure. With the base game containing the first case, and the next cases being released as they are developed as DLC.

name: Excaliburian!!
description: Follow in the Legendary Hero's footsteps in a traditional, turn-based JRPG. Gather companions, explore the world and ascend the throne!

name: Clownfield 2042
description: Clownfield 2042 is an FPS where you take a role of unique soldier, equipped with six weapons that has to fight enemy and win the front. After 2022 cryptocrash caused by NFT's, majority of nations collapsed and a union of "No-Clowns" has been formed. You are one of them, arm up and get ready for war

name: Gutsy the Guinea Pig
description: In a desperate attempt to regain their former glory, the cats of the Internet have hatched a devious plot to reinvigorate their icons of old. How will they do this? By stealing the life force of defenseless guinea pigs! Help Gutsy the Guinea Pig navigate a series of magnetic obstacles to retrieve the keys to his friends’ freedom.

name: Agarta
description: Agarta is an interactive live-action game (FMV), it follows the story of a serial killer nicknamed the Surgeon. You will observe his plans as he questions the themes of justice and law on earth. You have to choose wisely because any decisions you make will lead you to one of the 19 finals.

name: Lady Pac
description:
Lady Pac is a homage to Ms. Pac-Man, an arcade game published by Midway in 1982.

Main differences from the original version:
- Randomly generated mazes
- Bonus rounds

name: Assimilate
description: A roguelike where you take over the enemies' bodies and use their powers against them

name: Filch
description: A Harry Potter Horror Fan Game

name: Invite the Blackbird
description: Invite The Blackbird is a hand-drawn watercolour 2d game made in a form of comics. Follow the heart-warming story about Sonya and the blackbird. As the story unfolds, few point-and-click puzzles will be on your way.

name: Anivenge
description: An arcade style game where you play as an animal hopping around a road trying to crash cars. Work your way through different levels or play in survival mode - how many can you crash before you're run over?

name: Train Your Brain
description: Train Your Brain is a mental training game for improving the interaction between both sides of the brain. For best results use both hands to control the game, play daily and try to hit your last day's score each time.

name: They Grow
description: Survive as enemies grow and mutate in real-time as you try to save humanity from disease.

name: What's Wrong with Jasper?
description: Help your animal friends find what they're missing in order to find a cure for your dog.

name: Unholy Eyeballs
description: an ocular nightmare

name: There You Are
description:
An exploratory narrative game about grief featuring stop-motion inspired graphic design and two endings based on your choices and actions.

You take the role of Su as you try to deal with her life and get away from the past.

name: Jo's House
description: Jo's house is a maze building game where you must rearrange the furniture of the HQ Residential House to create the longest path from Jo's bed to one of the exits (front door, back door or garage). At night Jo will start rolling around the house to either attack you, eat a pie or exit the house. Your goal is to survive 3 nights doing the following 2 things: #1: Don't get hit by Jo. #2: Don't let Jo leave the house.

name: Mr.Tomatos
description: Welcome to my game, buddy!

name: CrashMetal
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Valley
description: Sin descripción

name: Donkey Kong Country: The Trilogy
description: Donkey Kong Country: The Trilogy is a fan game made by André Productions. The game is a reimagining of the original Donkey Kong Country trilogy, with the same art style made popular by Rare. It has 40 newly designed stages and a new game mechanics not present in the original trilogy, like the rocket from Donkey Kong Country Returns.

name: GeoBingo.io
description: A free multiplayer Street View bingo game. Find words on Street View and have fun playing against your friends or alone with multiplayer and single player.

name: The Revenant Protocol
description: The Revenant Protocol is a third person shooter with hack'n slash features where you will combine your deadly blade and vicious firepower to become the apex hunter in a world mutated by an experimental technology.

name: Burn Me Alive 2
description: The genre of our game is a mixture of psychological horror and drama with elements of action, survival melee, and shooting.

name: Bubble Star Party
description: It's a 3D multiplayer world with more than 30 characters with various skills to unlock, and a level editor with more than 500 terrain modules, dozens of obstacles and traps. In addition to built-in levels, you can make your level!Let other players have fun cooperating and competing in your level!

name: Courage: The Videogame
description: Fan horror ARG game based on the cartoon "Courage the Cowardly Dog"

name: Falta
description: Falta is a survival-horror game set in a brazilian public school. Play as Davi, as you look for your missing best-friend Tiago through the dark hallways and classroms of your school. Find and collect "mementos", clues about your friend's whereabouts...

name: System32
description: Teleport into a 1988 personal computer running a visually intense bullet hell simulation. Fight alongside your team to destroy Russian hackers in real-time.

name: Zoey: My Hentai Sex Doll
description: Meet Zoey, the beautiful girl from the next door. Do your best to conquer her love! She will adapt to please your need and offer you a one to one session with unlimited possibilities. Spend all the time you want with her but don't exceed your limits.

name: Ultimate Heroes
description: Create your own party (up to 8 heroes!) and enjoy an automatic battle and tag play. Strengthen your heroes with the growth system and play a fierce battle with unique bosses. 9 game modes are waiting for your hero. Enjoy vivid stories and characters with interesting and inspiring skills!

name: Dating Simulator
description: Dating Simulator is a simulation game where you meet and interact with different people.

name: Blackout
description:
A witch on the roof of a scary old house. Black cats, cobwebs, and a crescent moon - all too creepy! In this point & click adventure, your task is to guide the main character Marilyn as she ventures deeper and deeper into a mysterious house in the middle of the night.

Blackout is a straight forward point & click adventure. Investigate, navigate, and use items to interact with things in your environment.

name: Dinomod
description: Dinomod is a ROM hack/mod of Dinosaur Planet which has the same purpose of fixing the issues on the prototype version of the game that leaked onto the internet, and also adds debugging tool options to the code.

name: Dinopatch
description: Dinopatch is a ROM hack/mod of Dinosaur Planet which intends on fixing the issues on the prototype version of the game that leaked onto the internet (such as event triggering, bugs, glitches, crashes), making it as playable as it can be.

name: Adventure Bit
description: Jump, run, steal, fight, catch, and solve puzzles in this minimal-style adventure inspired by the golden age of the Japanese computer MSX!

name: Return to Yoshi's Island 64
description: Return to Yoshi's Island 64 is a Super Mario 64 ROM hack/mod by Kaze Emanuar.

name: Car Physics Simulator: Trucks + Missions DLC
description: Playable Trucks and Truck Missions.

name: Among Us: Impostor Edition
description: Play online with 4-15 players as you attempt to hold your spaceship together and return back to civilization. But beware... as there may be an alien impostor aboard!

name: Arcane Walker
description: Players play an arcane mage in the game. At the beginning of each game, players need to master more than 50 kinds of arcane magic to attack all kinds of enemies. The collision of roguelike's playing method and magic greatly increases the players' love for the game.

name: Sausage Man
description: Parachute into the battlefield and fight with other players in competitive, lighthearted battle royale action in Sausage Man! You can play Sausage Man anytime, anywhere. Using highly customizable sausage characters, swaying your weapons, team up with your friends to become the “King of the Party”.

name: Art of the Rail
description: Spiritual remake of the classic transport tycoon games. Build a profitable transport network and grow your worlds economy, either on your own in singleplayer or in multiplayer whether cooperatively or competitively.

name: The Weald
description: Following the last of the Salem Witch Trials, a Puritan father claims to have had a vision showing a place where his missing son might be, and suspects a witch is behind his abduction.

name: Leave No One Behind: la Drang
description: Leave No One Behind is tactical real time strategy war game. Experience some of the hardest battles fought during the Vietnam War in 1965 between US Army and the Army of the Northern Vietnam for landing zones X-Ray and Albany and for Plei Me special forces camp.

name: Alon
description: Alon – is an adventure game about a child who fell into the great abyss...

name: Grapple
description: Grapple is a parkour game built for speedrunning. You're tasked to reach the end of the level only with the aid of a grappling hook & glider.

name: Arcane Waters
description: From swashbuckling on the high seas to idyllic days on your peaceful farm, from remote trading towns to monster-filled lands, it’s time to gather some friends and go on an adventure! Whether you’re a pirate, trader, crafter or farmer, choose your ship and explore a vast new world.

name: The Dinosaurs Are Here
description: The Dinosaurs Are Here is a physics-based sandbox game set in a huge park where you control a dinosaur. Hunt for humans and try to survive against the park security guards!

name: Push Me
description: Push Me (if you can) ! Is a 2D platformer where your goal is to push other players into the rising lava! Use items to eliminate others while staying alive. Play fast paced games with your Friends locally or through Steams remote play. Discover new maps and become the best PUSHER out there!

name: Lost in Labs
description: Control the mind of your enemies in this stealth platformer. In Lost in Labs, Lucian will have to save his best friend, Amber. For that, he'll have to sneak around, distracting and possessing those who are in his way, in order to proceed.

name: Trial of Two
description: Trial of Two is a local co-op beat 'em up game with powerful, physics-based martial-arts combat. Do you dare to enter The Dojo and fight alongside your friend?

name: Cat Designer Mocha
description: "I'm gonna become a designer in this town!" Mocha is a cat, and her dream journey starts here.

name: Horrors of Space
description: Horrors of Space is a 4-player co-op survival horror game. You and 3 other crew members awaken from cryo sleep to find the Aries in a state of emergency, invaded by an alien creature. It’s up to you and your teammates to work together to get out alive.

name: Buddha Go
description: Buddha GO is a new 1 vs 1 racing game in development using Unity by the Japanese studio ksym.

name: Sengoku Block Bashi
description:
Experience the battles of Japan's Warring States period!

Defeat famous samurai from all over Japan and aim to unite the country while enjoying a loose conversation with the ditzy character Zy in Samurai Brick Breaker.

Enjoy the story told by Zy and the ending that comes after clearing the hard mode.

name: Dark Seeker
description: This is a 3D dungeon RPG filled with unique characters and monsters by the solo developer kemuri.

name: SCP: Forgotten Facility
description: SCP: Forgotten Facility is a 20th century WW2-Era based horror game revolving around the SCP universe. Play multiplayer with others in a pvp team based game in a fight to flee the facility. Explore over 15 SCP-Objects and 7 playable SCP's.

name: Chick Invasion
description: Chickens. They've made a deal with the aliens. Humanity has but one hope, Jimmy Gunson, a train, and he just wants to get home.

name: Alas Astra
description: Among distant stars a lone Robot Knight must stand against an ancient and unfathomable evil. Explore the vast and alien Degathalion space station and battle the nefarious Xetanoids in a daring quest to confront their rulers and save the Centaurus galaxy.

name: Jetpack Jack
description: Jetpack platformer. Fly around, avoid obstacles, collect dog biscuits to feed your hungry dogs!

name: Vagabond Starship
description: A riveting space adventure full of fantasy characters and a unicorn! Sir Typhil of Creulor and his fearless crew of elves, dwarves, aliens, and robots set out on a search across various unknown worlds, meeting zealots, rogues, reporters, and more as they seek out the ever-elusive rutabaga.

name: Overland Weekend
description: It's the weekend and you have your off-road vehicle ready for weekend of adventure. Time to hit the trails and find a nice remote place to setup camp.

name: Chibits
description: Explore an abandoned planet and uncover the mysteries behind the event that ended the world. Travel through a charred forest, large factory and run down cities as you collect upgrades and battle the relics that were left behind.

name: Lavalamp
description: 3D first-person walking simulator with a side of exploration/interaction with the environment. The game tells the story of the Space Lemmings from Space who, after running many experiments with breakfast alphabet and the space-time continuum, got blocked between dimensions (or something).

name: Bounty Brawl
description: Play as a bounty hunter. Hunt your most wanted targets through the eye-catching nostalgic worlds. Gather a team of friends and work together to defeat Criminal Bosses. And most importantly, TRUST NO ONE!

name: Smart Fart
description: Smart Fart is a silly strategy game about a warehouse worker who ate too many beans. Your resource is your main enemy, so spend it wisely !

name: Vorlaw: Space Opera
description: Vorlaw is our world. Vorlaw is perfection. Vorlaw is order. Vorlaw can't tolerate your poisonous deviant mind. Run away and fight for freedom. No matter how.

name: Block Machine
description: A difficult programming puzzle game about building parallel computing machines by placing blocks to solve surprisingly hard problems.

name: The Great Hide n Seek Expawdition
description: A chill find-them-all game with roguelite elements and local coop for little and big kids. Find all the animal babies that went hiding away in the forest. Play as a raccoon dad or a rabbit mum, explore the environments, find hidden treasures and bring everybody home.

name: Bygone Dreams
description: Bygone Dreams is a high fantasy Action-Adventure set inside a surreal dream world. Face fantastical adversaries, solve puzzles, and fight your way through challenging bosses in your quest to save the world's matron deity and stop the nightmare consuming the dream.

name: The Bar Fight
description: Jump into a hilarious, physics-based, action game where you must throw, slam, and dodge your way to victory in a destructible environment! Filled to the brim with flimsy ragdoll characters and magical potions, launch yourself into The Bar Fight and engage in drunken chaos.

name: A Museum of Self & Space
description: Museum of Self & Space is a narrative game about inner demons and how they're reflected in the world around us.

name: Bearable Nightmares
description: Smash, dash, crash, and slash through spooky forests, creepy arcades, chilling schools, and more as you upgrade your teddy hero with amazing set of abilities to reclaim the freedom to dream!

name: Plugged
description: The year is 3397. The prison systems have been long abolished. Convicts' bodies are destroyed, their consciousness plugged into the mainframe to compete in eternal gladiatorial combat. Run, fly, and shoot your way to victory through the mainframe. Get plugged, and enter the arena...

name: Human Vs Evil
description: A few years later, Crix found that the place where he originally lived was occupied by alien species, and decided to call on the remaining humans to take home together!!!

name: TextSpaced
description: TextSpaced is a text-based sci-fi MMORPG played in your browser, where as a captain you attempt to survive and prosper in an infinite and hostile universe. TextSpaced blends the style of more traditional text adventures with modern principles to create a game where everyone coexists in the same expansive universe which is steeped in lore and intrigue. The entire universe is organic where everything is connected to everything else, every decision you make has a cascade of repercussions for you and your faction. The sandbox nature of the game leaves you, the player, the freedom to decide at any point what to do next.

name: Fish Tanks
description: Fish Tanks is an arena shooter game where you play as a tank-driving fish with one objective - to bring as many starfish back to your base before time runs out. Battling the clock and the opposing team, arm yourself with power-ups and blast the opposing team to steal their starfish before they shoot you out of your tank.

name: Hitman Sniper: The Shadows
description: Enter the hidden World of Assassination and experience the competitive life of The Shadows - an elite team of highly-skilled snipers - as you take down targets around the world in countless creative ways.

name: The Magnilo Case
description: Detective game released for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 2021.

name: Battle Dome
description: Battle Dome is a top-down arena brawler set in a futuristic colosseum. Gladiators can collect resources and upgrade their gear on the fly while the arena closes sector after sector. Last player standing wins.

name: Hegemony III: Isle of Giants
description: Centuries before the founding of Rome, the Nuragic tribes of Sardinia were building thousands of monumental fortresses, tombs and statues across their rugged Mediterranean island. In the second official expansion for Hegemony III, play as any of a dozen new factions of the mysterious Nuragic civilization to unite the islands of Sardinia and Corsica and compete for dominance of the ancient world against the Roman, Greek and Gallic factions of the mainland.

name: Zoo Strikers
description: Zoo Strikers is a free team-based action game like no other; Classic tactical shooter game-modes, 3rd person platformer controls, movable terrain, and it has bearfelf.

name: It's Fall
description:
A 2d fall game, Your heading your grammas house for thanksgiving but something else happens...

Planned released in fall.

name: The Meating
description:
Become a ghost minotaur on the quest to put his meat back together in this puzzle platformer. Use pyrokinesis, possession and an array of other ghost skills to solve puzzles, and the mystery of who butchered you.

- 40+ Puzzle Platformer Levels
- Arsenal of Ghost Powers
- Veal and Raw Modes

name: Cubia
description: CUBIA is a relaxing 3D puzzle platformer set in an atmospheric world, where the ground rotates under your feet. Solve intriguing puzzles to save the world of CUBIA!

name: Lovely Overseer
description: Lovely Overseer is an animated romantic dating simulator in the furry style. You are a young lieutenant overseeing the correction of magically talented individuals in the closed and isolated complex of the military Academy. Your main task is to maintain order and train recruits.

name: Firing Vibes
description: Firing Vibes is an online multiplayer shooter where you shoot with music. It also features a tremendous amount of verticality and a unique set of movement abilities to go with it. Outplay your opponents with better aiming, movement skills and a hint of rhythm.

name: Rise Against the Invaders
description: An alien menace has ravaged Earth. Humanity has scattered to the wind. But hope remains. A resistance is organizing. Build and defend your settlement in this hybrid city-building tower defense game.

name: Tree House Survivors
description: Through an "accident" seafarers arrive on an island where they have to fight for their survival. Help them by building and managing a tree house for them.

name: Tale of a Wolf
description: Tale Of A Wolf is a story driven, open world wolf adventure, that puts the fate of Sylvanna in your hands. Join forces with nature and expel man!

name: Catventure
description: Pixel art metroidvania platformer about the adventures of a white kitten. Jumps, coins, keys, funny opponents, secret doors - all that. There is even dialogue and a plot.

name: Age of Ascent
description: Age of Ascent is a truly massive multiplayer space game set in a vast galaxy. It features direct-piloting real-time battles with thousands of ships in a single universe, an entirely player-driven economy, deep strategy, and exploration in an evolving sandbox world.

name: Darkest Valley
description:
On the run from a cosmic horror, a young man finds hope in a small town and the journey that begins there. 
 
Darkest Valley is a 2.5D Action RPG, a hybrid throwback to Diablo II and Legend of Mana. Loot, plan your build, traverse the skill trees, and embark on a journey that spans the character's life - in the valley of the shadow of death.

name: Dum Dum Dinos
description: Dum Dum Dinos is a strategic puzzle game that follows a T-Rex named Tyson and his dinosaur friends who must navigate through a new and mysterious land. Team up with new characters and engage in real-time battle against evil oppressors who want to take over the world.

name: Turrican: Ultra Collector's Edition
description:
Welcome back… to Turrican! In the Turrican Anthology Vol 1 & 2.

The Turrican Collection includes:
Turrican Anthology Vol. 1
- Turrican (Amiga)
- Turrican 2 (Amiga)
- Super Turrican (SNES)
- Super Turrican Director's Cut (SNES)
- Mega Turrican Score Attack (Mega Drive)
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 2

Turrican 3 (Amiga)
- Mega Turrican (Mega Drive)
- Mega Turrican Director's Cut (Mega Drive)
- Super Turrican 2 (SNES)
- Super Turrican 1 Score Attack (SNES)

The Collector's Edition contains:
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 1 Game for Nintendo Switch
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 2 Game for Nintendo Switch
- Collector's box with magnetic latch
- Turrican Documentary (BluRay)
- Soundtrack
- Art Book
- Sticker Sheet
- 4 Acrylic Art Cards
- 2 Large reversible Posters
- Enamel Pin
- Signed Postcard (Print)
- Approximate size of the Ultra Collector's Edition box: 22cm x 16cm x 7,5cm (8,7 x 6,3 x 3 Inches)

name: Turrican Collector's Edition
description:
Welcome back… to Turrican! In the Turrican Anthology Vol 1 & 2.

The Turrican Collection includes:
Turrican Anthology Vol. 1
- Turrican (Amiga)
- Turrican 2 (Amiga)
- Super Turrican (SNES)
- Super Turrican Director's Cut (SNES)
- Mega Turrican Score Attack (Mega Drive)
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 2

Turrican 3 (Amiga)
- Mega Turrican (Mega Drive)
- Mega Turrican Director's Cut (Mega Drive)
- Super Turrican 2 (SNES)
- Super Turrican 1 Score Attack (SNES)

The Collector's Edition contains:
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 1 Game for Nintendo Switch
- Turrican Anthology Vol. 2 Game for Nintendo Switch
- Collector's box with magnetic latch
- Turrican Documentary (BluRay)
- Soundtrack
- Art Book
- Sticker Sheet
- 4 Acrylic Art Cards
- 2 Large reversible Posters
- Enamel Pin
- Signed Postcard (Print)
- Approximate size of the Ultra Collector's Edition box: 22cm x 16cm x 7,5cm (8,7 x 6,3 x 3 Inches)

name: Pac-Man Live Studio
description: PAC-MAN LIVE STUDIO is a game published by Amazon playable on the Twitch website. It lets you play co-op multiplayer PAC-MAN with friends online and publish mazes to the community. It was created in celebration of PAC-MAN’s 40th Anniversary.

name: Hell Can Wait
description: Hell Can Wait is a diabolic action-roguelike that combines the furious, fast-paced combat of a bullet-hell shooter with the deep strategy of a deck-building card game. With over 250 cards to unlock, find the perfect combo to send the demon hordes back to Hell!

name: Orbitals
description: Gladiators, Grenades and Gravity Boots! Players battle in arenas filled with monsters, opponents, and friends. Single-player or Co-op story mode. Play with and against friends in online or local multiplayer mayhem.

name: Iron Vulture
description: Iron Vulture is a real-time strategy line defender. You can command six soldiers in real-time combat, move them across lanes, and use their abilities to eliminate wave after wave of mutated creatures.

name: In Plain Sight
description: An emotional and impactful story set in modern America among residents of a trailer park who struggle not only with their economic situation but also with a net of mysteries and secrets.

name: Darkevo
description: Darkevo is game about exploration, combat, and management. Explore an open world finding new monsters to fight, aliens to befriend, and areas to conquer all on a new planet.

name: All Must Fall
description: You fell into a pit and for some reason you can only move with a pole. Can you get out?

name: Car Thief Simulator
description: Can you imagine owning any car you want? The life of a car thief can be very exciting! Car chases, adrenaline, breaking into secured places and much more. As a car thief, you have to be smart, trust no-one and be very quick when breaking into cars or garages.

name: Astralode
description: Join the Azimuth Starminers and harvest precious ore from wild asteroids! Astralode is asteroid mining puzzle action with an interstellar support crew of colorful misfits.

name: UEDI: Shadow of the Citadel
description: I came to find the truth and to find my friend. But this forbidden place is entangled in war. They prey on us night and day. I must find the strength to rise from the shadows. Soon they will all know my name. My name is UEDI.

name: Darklin Wars
description: Unlike most (if not all) other MMORTS games, Darklin Wars is not pay to win. We are building a game that is purely subscriber based and delivers a game play experience where the best players, who are able to build relationships, master the strategic elements, and play smarter will win out.

name: Let It Happen
description: Let It Happen is a physics-simulation game inspired by recent democratic protests in Russia. Place protesters and police in the square, click on Let It Happen! and enjoy the show. Explore the city: it has a bunch of interactive locations.

name: Orbis Fugae
description: Follow self-crowned Pirate Queen Anya Ophelia Morgan on a world-spanning escape quest!

name: Hero Syndrome
description: Hero Syndrome is a third-person shooter featuring competitive multiplayer mode, intricate building system discouraging boxing up and camping, as well as deep single-player story mode, full of clever building puzzles for players to beat!

name: The Perfect Concept
description: This is a short horror game, that delves into the mind of an indie game developer, trying to make the perfect horror game.

name: Frozen Memories
description: Is it true that the picture is recorded? Not necessarily. "But I think, even if it's a fake photo, the emotions of the creators it contains are true after all." She said. So, must your memory be true again? She smiled, didn't speak, but touched the camera with her hand.

name: Aurora: Weather Warfare
description: An adventure game set in the near future in a world of cataclysmic climate changes. As one of the few lucky survivals, you’re about to embark on a full of peril, pitfalls, and difficult choices journey to the epicenter of the weather disaster to solve the mystery.

name: 4th Super Industrial Revolution Wars
description: Real programming game.

name: The Meldstorm
description: The Meldstorm is a roguelite action platformer with a focus on creative item synergies. Build devastating weapons and mow down hoards of enemies and deadly bosses in order to come out victorious of the pillar's trials.

name: Birds Are Real
description: Are Birds Real? - Just another day flying over the city & monitoring the plebs. Welcome to the United States Department of B.I.R.D.S. Choose your drone then keep the peace and make sure everyone keeps Believing in Birds.

name: Pawnshop Tycoon
description: Start with a garage full of old junk and expand to a thriving business. Manage sales and train staff to automate redundant tasks. Relocate or expand your shop with many options across the city. Learn all the ins and outs of becoming a big city Pawnshop Tycoon!

name: Birth to Death
