description: Embark on the wonderful adventure that is life. Form meaningful connections with the people around you. Be comforted by material wealth. Experience a vast array of achievements… Unless you screw it up and die before doing anything.

name: Revival of Love
description: Revival of Love is a nonviolent, musical, low poly, open world, action-adventure game about young saxophonist, Adolphine, who sets off on a journey to heal an island which has sunken in darkness.

name: Mahou Mating
description: Punish the naughty magical girls by turning them into your brainwashed sex toys in this fully-voiced erotic visual novel!

name: The Aftermath: Unnatural Selection
description: The Aftermath: Unnatural Selection, is a story driven Survival/RPG game set years after human civilization has been decimated by an Alien invasion

name: Listeria Wars
description: Listeria Wars is a tactical strategy where we protect the hero’s body from various infections and viruses by controlling the troops of the immune system. We can observe his personal life and even influence it with side effects.

name: Chant
description: When several syllables of a divine name are discovered simultaneously, and men full of illusions try to harness them, an ex-monk is thrust back into a world of mysticism and divinity, to preserve or forever change it. Choose your fate in this fully customizable action platformer!

name: The Miserable Crimson Hooded Girl
description: Once upon a time, there was a miserable girl in a crimson hood. Her mother was unwell, so the girl was sent away to go stay with her grandmother, who lived deep within the woods in a strange house. People say that around those parts there resides a monster called the Gobbler, who preys on the weak...

name: Airport Contraband
description: Engage in a hands-on approach to airport security. Ever wondered what it would be like to be responsible for all the security operations and preventing contraband on a modern airport? Now you can!

name: Dreamo VR
description: The plane crashed, bringing an abrupt end to your journey. You regain consciousness in a strange lucid dream filled with interactive cube puzzles, where a mysterious voice guides you through the changing landscape. What is happening? Who are you? Do you have what it takes to wake up?

name: Lethal Wedding
description:
Get ready to Bride Hard as you fight through insane odds and some mother-daughter issues! Say “I do” to bullets and blood in this top-down RPG shooter!

- Dodge roll into top-down shooter action!
- Get committed in 2 Player couch co-op mode!
- Play as 2 Female Protagonists!
- Arm yourself with ridiculous weapons like the explosive Gun of Roses, Banana SMG,
and bunny shooting Hare Trigger!
- Customize your character with over 25 upgrades! Each playthrough is a different experience!
- Earn your upgrades through the innovative Vow System, which applies risk/reward scenarios to each level! Want to unlock that Speed Reload upgrade? You'll need to say "I Do" to enemies with bonus damage and increased movement speed! Vows are optional, but worth the commitment!
- Crash your wedding, shoe stores, clown drug dens, and the circus in over 30 levels of carnage!
- Enjoy a story that explores mother-daughter issues, wedding stress, and criminal empires, told through fully animated cut scenes!

name: Monster Girl Fantasy 2: Exposed
description: Monster Girl Fantasy 2: Exposed is an RPG that takes you on a journey of temptation. Can you stay focused on the mission when the monster girls are willing to do anything to distract you?

name: Arcadia: The Crystal Wars
description: Arcadia is an open-world, squad-based fusion of role playing and strategy, combining traditional RPG elements such as character skills, talents, quests, dungeons, and raids with strategic base-building, farming, and crafting.

name: My Days with the Demoness
description: A rom-com visual novel which follows a NEET mechanic who accidentally brings the demon lord’s daughter to earth; as not to be indebted to him, she decides to stay with him to improve his “miserable life”; meanwhile he tries his best to fix the portal before time runs out. Will they be successful?

name: Ava
description:
In this narrative focused 2D platformer, Ava must rely on her trusty grappling hook and other abilities to maneuver treacherous realms and find the lost pirates. However, finding them is only half of the battle–she’s got to apply her knowledge to help the pirates solve their social quandaries. Only then can she bring them back into the fold, and ultimately find her brother. 
 
As she ventures through the strange and mysterious worlds, she’ll experience interactive stories that her maps could never tell. Worlds are filled with secrets and hidden objectives waiting for someone to find them. By engaging with the universe on her fantastical journey, Ava recognizes, and utilizes, the strengths within herself.

name: Asterelis
description: Be nice.

name: Birds With Feelings
description:
The Strategy Game Where Feelings Matter! 
 
Birds with feelings is a cozy turn-based strategy game where you lead a team of birds and manipulate their feelings for the greater good.

name: Soulrun
description: Use your controller or keyboard to race through a hazardous world between the dead and the living. All things come to an end. So did your life. By accident, while going to meet the love of your life. Mr. Death is on a playful mood today, can there be another chance?

name: Chromatose
description: An Indie Visual Novel/Roleplay Game with emphasis on meaningful decisions, character relationships, and a compelling overarching story. Escape the collective nightmare in 12 hours, or never wake up.

name: Apostatic: Revenge From Hell
description: Apostatic - Revenge From Hell is an action and adventure game set in a wild and brutal archipelago. After her own death, Hellda will return from Hell to take revenge on the invaders.

name: The Burned Ground
description: THE BURNED GROUND is a MMO-action game in which the last surviving participant wins.Explore the island, play with friends, but remember only the strongest will survive! This is the BATTLE ROYALE!

name: The Voice Inside
description:
The Voice Inside is a psychological horror adventure game with different & challenging types of game control. Besides a modified controller & keyboard control system, the skill-based voice control type will give you a whole new voice-driven game experience.
You can choose between more than 30 commands to navigate a nearly blind character through a dark, infected and abstract world, while you solve puzzles, face enemies and perform actions to recover the light.
A voice inside the game will guide and help you to find a way out. Be Careful, 'the darkness' is watching your steps! Just listen, follow your intuition and give the right commands to reach your goal!

name: Vault: Tomb of the King
description: Dynamically switch between three unique heroes and brave your way through deadly enemies, puzzles and traps in search of the fabled treasure locked inside King Allard's tomb.

name: Hayles Quest
description: Darkness has engulfed the land, raising the un-dead and other unholy creatures from their very graves. Grasping his sword, Hayle sets out on a quest to vanquish the darkness and restore the light.

name: Cyborg_Lab
description: 『Cyborg_Lab』is a first person 3D puzzle game.Players must solve about 30 physics puzzle, and find out a hidden secret behind the peace space station.

name: Afarid
description: Afarid is a psychologic horror game with religious atmosphere, which is played in the first-person perspective. Will the last person from the blood of King Solomon succeed in breaking the spells and destroying the jinns, which had obsessed his family in an Anatolian town full of weirdnesses?

name: Death Maze
description: Path of life and death.

name: Avernus
description: Avernus is an atmospheric action-adventure game set in an ancient, mysterious tomb of a dead god. Delve into its labyrinthine halls, uncover its secrets and save the the last dregs of life from destruction.

name: Linkage
description: Find your story.

name: Summer Vacation
description:
Summer!, Beach! and VR!
Hot summer has come! How about vacations at VR Beach?
Let's experience a fun time a tropical beach.
You can enjoy VR tropical country with plenty of attractions!
It is also important to heal the tired body after plenty playing? !
It also implements functions that can be nulled using oil.
Here we go! Let's experience hot summer "SUMMER VACATION" this summer!
Here's your expectation!

name: John Mambo
description: John Mambo is a frenetic Retro Arcade Game with an isometric top down view. Meet John, a one man army, crazy enough to embark on a dangerous mission in the heart of a jungle all by himself...

name: The Con Simulator
description:
""The Con Simulator" is a simulation game for players who are dreaming about holding their own anime conference. In this game, you can become an eminent cosplayer, gamer, streamer or singer, stand out and become the legendary "Con" organizer, save the economy of your motherland "Republic of Metropolises"!

Combining tabletop strategy cards with traditional SLG gameplay, the players are able to manage their "Con" company, invite booths & guests and compete with peers. On the other hand, they also need to deal with several real-time tasks (hire NPC, punish copyright infringement booths) & emergencies (fire hazard, thieves) during the Con as a responsible organizer.

And of course, the game is MODable. You can create your personal booths & cosplayers if you want!"

name: Afandas Survival
description:
Afandas Survival is an open world survival game. After a plague wipes out most of the population, you're one of the few survivors on an island called Afanda. 
Already at the beginning you realize that surviving isn´t easy. To stay alive, you must search for equipment and provisions. To make life easier watch out for recipes to enhance your crafting skills. 
Hunger isn’t the only danger awaiting you on Afandas. Danger is all around you. Be it in form of wild animals, walking dead or other players where you can never know is it a friend or a foe. Are you goanna make it?

name: Desolation
description: Desolation is a battle royale game set within several different locations. Gameplay, Immersion, and Optimization will be the main focuses of this project. Making a pretty, but also a fun experience for all players is our goal. The game will feature no microtransactions or paid DLC, period.

name: Vulpine
description: Vulpine is a charming action exploration game where you venture through a living world as animals armed to the teeth. Enter a world reclaimed by nature with wildlife, discoveries, and mysteries abound. Encounter eccentric characters, fearsome monsters, and engage in heart pounding combat.

name: Unitystation
description:
Based on cult classic Space Station 13, Unitystation is a game centered around life on an outpost exploration ship in the far reaches of space.

The game is full of paranoia and lighthearted shenanigans, being a station that is as much at risk from clowns and mimes as it is from undercover operatives, eldritch cultists, changelings, demons, revolutions, and assaults from enemy corporations. Played in rounds that reset the station every time, the game features an assortment of jobs, including doctors, chemists, scientists, janitors, engineers, atmospheric technicians, security guards, bartenders and the all-important clown.

Each round’s randomly selected antagonists will try and execute plans to fight the station’s crew. Despite some unintuitive graphics and mechanics, the game can be incredibly addictive! Endless possibilities await you on the barely airtight deathtrap that is Unitystation...

name: Arenus
description: Arenus combines exciting arena based combat with unique characters and management mechanics. As the Warden you will chose your gladiator and set off on a path to make her champion of the Arena.

name: Mythlink
description: Mythlink is an upcoming VR-only monster battling game for the HTC Vive.

name: Tale of Ronin
description: A game about the human side of the Samurai. Live as a Ronin, survive the consequences of your choices in a dynamic world of turmoil and violence.

name: Cadence
description: You've been playing games most of your life. You've been listening to music even longer. Wouldn't it be great if making music was as easy as playing a game? Cadence lets you draw shapes as music. Let your imagination run free with the PC's first music sandbox game.

name: Tetris Dotbas
description: Another Tetris version made with Locomotive Basic for the Amstrad CPC computers. One or two players supported.

name: Salvage Title
description: A speedmap in an urban, junkyard & drive-in theather-themed level, with emphasis on layout & flow.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Contest 2021- Round 2
description:
Welcome to Round 2 of the 2021 SRB2 Official Level Design Contest, a computation fan-created maps for Sonic Robo Blast 2. This one was quite fun to put together.

Thanks to all our contestants! Have fun!

Single Player​:

Yet Another CEZ2 Knockoff - Othius

Radiant Forest Zone - Radsla

name: ShawnCena121
description: A 3d shooter strategy aim trainer game, using your scroll wheel will choose either your pistol or rifle. Using obstacles as cover avoiding trains and bullets.

name: Feng Qi Chang'an: Yu Gu Ren
description: Sin descripción

name: Luna Story Prologue
description: A picross puzzle game, telling the origin story of the other Luna Story games and the Moonkeeper.

name: Squonker 3
description: Squonker 3 is an 8 map megawad for Doom 2 and one of the most anticipated sequels in all of doom wads, featuring breathtaking visuals and hyper polished gameplay.

name: Slay the Wak
description:
Fan games of "woowakgood"
Year-end contest entries for the year 2021, 2022

name: Serial Woman
description: A Surreal Puzzle game with light horror elements and a PS1-style aesthetic.

name: Island of Hope
description: Your island vacation is interrupted when the director of the local museum suddenly disappears as does a precious Mayan casket from the museum. Now it's up to you to search a tropical paradise for clues and piece together a Mayan mystery full of modern-day lies, intrigues, and secrets.

name: Idle Huntress: Dragon Realm
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Boats of Farewell
description:
Little Boats of Farewell is a 10-minute point-and-click adventure about bidding farewell to things you want to leave behind. Stroll along the River of Goodbyes, where people from all over come to release boats carrying their farewells.

Think about what you want to say goodbye to this year and let your own boat drift down the river.

name: Problem Animals
description: Problem Animals is a top down view game that is not easy to navigate, and at the same time very beautiful. You will have to play the role of the Hedgehog who is trying to steal mushrooms from hares.

name: Sol 3000
description: In this science fiction action shooter you are St. Karen a Soldier Of Light in the year 3000 tasked with a mission of destroying remnant robot AI forces and strongholds.

name: The Roy Game
description: A game where puking zombies try to puke over your trashcans, you have to defend your trashcans by placing automatic puking robots. Meanwhile you have to attack the zombie-printing machines.

name: AMaze DOS
description: uncomplicated green DOS puzzle. will take you to a world of old games that lacked cool graphics and gameplay. The game used a recursive backtracking search algorithm.

name: Pinecone Game
description: Welcome to Pinecone Game, where you can plunge into the wonderful world of throwing pinecones into a well!

name: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea
description: At the turn of the century, Victorian life carries on with one sharp difference from our world — vampires run amok and are a part of every day life. After having run away from home to search for his best friend, the young Cecil meets Nemo, a pickpocketing vagabond. The two set out together but in order to find what they're searching for, they must first unravel the truth behind a series of brutal vampire attacks from a decade prior.

name: Through the World
description: Great Arcade with runner and clicker elements. There are unforgettable adventures waiting for you with many collapsing barriers and more. Get points for destroying barriers, update your health, increase the stock of spheres and open new worlds forward.

name: Tokyo Detectives
description: Detective Game. Murder Investigation. Interrogate witnesses. Rebut with evidence.

name: Crewmember Pigeon and the Case of the Burgled Buttons
description:
Year 3871 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

You're good at solving mysteries, right?

name: Hover Attack
description: Hover Attack, the definitive version of the robot action game that became a huge hit in 1984 and was ported to various consoles, is now available on STEAM with a port of the original game and an Ultimate Evolution version that dramatically evolves the gameplay with enhanced graphics and sound!

name: hexceed: Iter Pack
description: The third addition to hexceed, bringing 160 exciting new levels! This world includes the Rotating Tile mechanic that was introduced in the previous world, Animo!

name: Drivrooom
description:
Drivrooom is basically a game where you need to find your current location, while you're at the wheel of a car!

The player loads a video, and gather some clues from it, in order to find the country they're in to gain points

name: Hollow 2
description: Once again, you are on board Shakhter-One. Traverse the deck of a well-known mining ship and depths of Mark's twisted mind blended together. What really happened to this place? How your past is connected to the present events? Run, fight, hide, explore – do your best to destroy Shakhter-One.

name: Frogs vs. Storks
description: In Frogs vs. Storks you play with your little frogs that make a good and peaceful living in their beautiful pond. But, with the arrival of storks, the pond became a dangerous place to live! Storks are everywhere now just waiting for their chance to eat your frogs! Outsmart evil storks and once again make you pond a peaceful place to live in Frogs vs. Storks.

name: Wake the Dead
description: Wake the Dead is the first and only book of the Wake the Dead series.

name: Miku-15
description: A collection of five sliding puzzles themed around Hatsune Miku.

name: Jet Fighters with Friends (Multiplayer)
description: Single Player OR Multiplayer Jet Fighter Game with OR without A.I. Bots.

name: Sprucerio
description: You went to the forest for a tree. You have a sled on which you transport the tree. A kettle with hot tea (so hot that it doesn't cool down to the end). Lantern and ax. Having cut down a tree, night has come, you return home through a dark forest.

name: Manonnikki
description: Manonnikki is a Yume Nikki fangame, featuring characters from a web series called loveweb. The game uses parts of late 2000's-early 2010's internet culture in its aesthetics. You play as Manontsuki and explore a strange dream world contained in their computer.

name: Toy Collector
description: Toy Collector is a casual puzzle game. In this game, players need to complete the sequential connection between the blocks in a sorting manner and classify the blocks of different colours to synthesize dolls.

name: Stinky and Loof in Wonderland
description: Stinky and Loof in Wonderland breaks the mold for action-puzzle games, combining fun 3D visuals with compelling gameplay! Guide our heroes through more than 240 named levels, all individually designed, and all different. Discover hidden secrets, engage quirky adversaries, and solve a wide variety of ingeniously designed puzzles.

name: The Princess of the Tower wants a Hero
description: Princess Lumi has been held captive in the demon lord’s castle situated in a land of everlasting winter. She hates it. It’s cold, it’s lonely, the food is bad, and there’s literally nothing to do! The only good thing about this place is the tea and snacks.

name: Par 1 Golf 9
description: 18 holes, 18 lives, its you against the 2d golf course in Par One Golf 9! To line up your shot, touch the golf ball and drag back then release to shoot. Learn the tricks and beat the golf course. The ninth installment of Par One Golf will challenge you and frustrate you just like real golf!

name: Comixxx Memories
description: Comixxx Memories is a casual game with relaxing atmosphere featuring high quality, hot & sexy girls done in comic book style. Enjoy the classic card match gameplay.

name: Déjà-Vu VR
description: In the city of “Evia” several residents are infected with light. A girl discovers what appears to be the host. It befriends it, feeds it and houses it. Not to the delight of the other residents. They want to drive the landlord away. A persecution begins ...

name: Amazin' George
description: Guide George home through a expansive maze world with fun abilities, tricks and challenges along the way! George is a fun game for all ages. Do you have what it takes to escape the maze?

name: Loonies Puzzle
description: A retro-inspired block puzzle game, featuring FM synthesis and a 256-color graphics mode with color cycling, but adapted for wide screen, touch inputs and other modern amenities.

name: Robots n Lasers
description: Robots n Lasers is my first Project to be published. It is a shooter based on fast reactions, aim and a little bit of patience.

name: Candy Monsters
description: Candy Monsters is a match 3 game! Allowing you to make different matches !Create bombs with various effects !Use bats to crush the candy! with more than 500 levels, super fun and challenging! game with over 200 hours of game play! distract and call your friends to have fun! play now

name: Horny Pixels
description: Horny pixels - In this mahjong connect game you can solve puzzles and admire beautiful animations of sex scenes that can teach you something new!

name: Tactical Operations Force
description: Tactical Operations Force - TOF is a Third Person Shooter Game that allow players to play up to 10 vs 10 matches over the internet on Steam.

name: The Defaloon
description: The Defaloon - this is a single-player game made in an abstract 2.5-day schedule. The essence of the gameplay is to clear the level of enemies with a large number of different weapons, such as magic or spells.

name: Mother Stone
description: Take the role of Agent Blair as she fights her way through Zombies, Cultists and Giant Snakes to uncover the truth about the Mother Stone. Battle challenging bosses, Collect useful power-ups to give Agent Blair an edge over the unknown monsters that plague The Thurston House.

name: Road Mayhem
description: Road Mayhem - A driving adventure for all fans of the racing genre! Get behind the wheel of your car and go on a trip along the highways. There is only you, an endlessly long road and crowds of enemies who will try to lead you astray ...

name: A True History of the Adamant Gambit
description:
Year 3801 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

eventually, seeds find a way to grow

name: Lost Snowmen
description: A puzzle-platformer starring three characters with different skill sets, who will have to assist each other during their adventures in order to fulfill a variety of level objectives.

name: Smol Dungeon
description: Navigate through the depths of the SMOL DUNGEON using your wits, TRAPS, and TELEPORTERS. You seek the noblest of treasures, THE CHALICE. But beware! There are DANGEROUS MONSTERS in this dark place. Mind the BLOOD too, you don't want to dirty your shoes do you?

name: Charm
description: A flash fiction about truth, lies, and tips.

name: I'm going to die if I don't eat sushi!
description:
A casual free action game based on Japan's world-class sushi.
If you don't keep eating sushi, you will die.

name: Cartoon Tower Defense
description: Prepare for intense and epic battles in this Tower Defense game with many different sceneries and toon characters. Upgrade your archers, enjoy magics, spells, super arrows and other power-ups, and defend your fortresses from barbarians. With its simple yet very addictive gameplay and its superb realization, Cartoon Tower Defense will offer you many hours of pure joy. Get Ready!

name: PandaMonium: Corporate Carnage
description:
Play as Panda Headed Serial Killer Jacob Jakushi as he knives his way through the offices of Killmore & Percival, dispatching Yuppies and taking Strippers as payment in this brand new adventure which promise all kinds of Corporate Carnage.

Based on the Indie Horror hit Pandamonium, Pandamonium: Corporate Carnage adapts the movies story whilst leaving into the wacky nature of 80's and 90's movie game adaptions and pushing the films narratives to new. absurd places.

name: Exsanguinate
description: Exsanguinate is an indie survival horror game with challenging puzzles and AI. Play as Matthew Barker and explore an abandoned mansion located in the mountains of Black Ridge. Solve the riddle of what has happened there.

name: Goddess Husk
description: A beautifully presented adventure to awaken the Goddesses of old begins here. Guide your mute knight and blind magicker through harrowing encounters with the creatures of the Scourge and then wipe them out in the blink of an eye using the legendary power of the giantess Goddess.

name: Car Wash TD: Tower Defense
description: A simple one-of-a-kind tower defense game where you need to wash cars before they reach the end of the road. Create mazes. Upgrade your towers. Wash all sorts of cars, trucks, boats, and planes.

name: Gunzo!
description: Gunzo is a Single player fps game that features, A draw bridge, enemy's you can kill, very good shooting effects, milk that heals you, really good graphics, and most importantly very fun gameplay!

name: Business Empire: RichMan
description:
Business Empire: RichMan is a highly interactive game that provides players with a realistic and engaging business management experience.
Whether you want to open your own business - a store or a bank, become an investor, or purchase luxury items, Business Empire: RichMan has something for everyone. The simulation game's immersive and interactive gameplay provides endless possibilities for players like you to build your empire and become a true RichMan.

name: Unhappy Cinderella
description: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Kurumi Diary
description: Kurumi Diary is a casual simulation game developed by Giant Network. In this game, players can interact with an adorable girl called Kurumi in her everyday life!

name: Super Mario Bros. For Lost Players
description: Falling asleep after a hard day's work, Mario finds himself in a dream with both familiar and foreign worlds merging and meshing into one another. Unable to wake up from this odd walk down memory-lane, he must continue advancing forward, wherever it may lead him.

name: Catherine Ragnor: Blackbeards Fury
description: Play the second part of the great Match3 saga! After her adventures with the cursed captain of the Flying Dutchman, Catherine Ragnor has a new ship. Yet when she returns home after a long voyage, she finds that her village is under attack by the notorious pirate Blackbeard. Help her to defeat him!

name: The Christmas Spirit: Golden Ticket - Collector's Edition
description: You need a Christmas miracle!

name: 69 Iris Hot
description: 69 Iris Hot is a visual novel with puzzle elements, based on cyberpunk esthetic. Our heroine Iris is extremely attractive but hard to communicate with. She likes the excitement of solving the puzzles yet too unexpirienced in competing with others.

name: SpookyKillers
description: Spooky zOmBiEs are getting close! Have fun tonight playing alone or with 3 friends! Perfect party night game for HARDCORE team work =0

name: 10 Seconds to Win!
description: 10 seconds to win! is a platform game where you only have 10 seconds to complete each stage, be agile and skillful to complete all levels.

name: Cyber Girls 2022
description: Join the Cyber Girls fighters on a Sci-fi city Beat Em Up!

name: One Day
description: Survive for One Day in a valley, where elementals want to kill you. Cast fireballs, avoid water and travel between islands to live as long as you can! Can you do it?

name: Russian Train Trip
description: Traveling on passenger trains in Russia. First-person exploration.

name: Elements of Dreams
description: Elements of Dreams is pixel art action role playing game (much like the original Legend of Zelda). Play as the heroine who must discover four unique powers in order to defeat her nightmares and find her purpose.

name: Cirro Investigates: The Chilling Truth Behind Deck 13!!
description:
Year 3713 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

Okay, are you recording?

name: Myths and Legends Bundle: Tunche & Black Book
description: Sin descripción

name: Superpanda
description: Superpanda just landed from space to start new missions on our planet. Superpanda is a modern action platformer with precise gamepad controls, fluid movement, and smooth animations. Explore vast levels filled with secrets, quests and loot. Fight your way through hordes of evil monsters and other creatures - jump on their head or throw them bullets to get rid of them. Eat fruits to gain more health and keep playing on 3 worlds and 36 levels. Superpanda will please boys and girls at all ages. Starts playing!

name: Pets VR
description:
Some charming pets are waiting for you to play with them - come and see what they’re up to in Pets VR!
There is a lot to do in Pets Resort, some of your duties will include: Petting cute doggo, playing with adorable Cat, making sure that they both have something to snack on and are well-rested, walking without a care in the world through the beautiful park, playing one of the multiple mini-games in which you can win special points!
Ready for some challenges? Time for some training! Learn special gestures and instruct your pet to perform different tricks - if you’re consistent it gets easier in time but be aware the pet can also forget some lessons! Reward yourself and your pupil and make it fancy! Exchange points to create your own collection of fun accessories for you and your pet to enjoy. Discover everything Pets VR can offer and most importantly, have fun!

name: Underswap: Distrust the Game 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Hanafuda Koi-koi Dojo
description: Sin descripción

name: A Dark Winter Wander
description:
This is a short Christmas game for Game boy. It's about Embla and how she tries to handle the holidays and her strained relationship with her family. She's drawn into a twilight world of spirits where she undertakes a mysterious year walk, where she might get perspective on things or not.

It's up to you.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Arisen Pack
description:
Rise to the top in no time with the Arisen Pack - a best-value bundle filled with high tier rewards and a whole month's worth of Bonus XP. It's the perfect treat to thrust yourself to mastery!

This pack includes all the content of the Zealot Pack DLC with extra rewards.

Full content of this DLC:
- A Legendary Dragon Skin for the Phantom
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Windguard
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Marauder
- 3,000 Gems
- A full epic outfit for the Phantom
- A Legendary helmet for the Windguard
- A Legendary helmet for the Marauder
- An Epic weapon for the Windguard
- An Epic weapon for the Marauder
- A 30-day xp booster
- 3 banners, player titles, profile wallpapers and player icons

name: VR New York Story, Settle in New York
description: VR New York Story's second edition, "Settle in New York" is now finally released! Consisting of 120 episodes including various situations, this is a total package for you to advance your English speaking skills! With Virtual Reality technology, you will feel as if you are in New York!

name: Super Metroid: Hotlands
description:
Samus has been hired to take out a Space Pirate mining operation on the planet Vulkin, a Class-XIII Wasteland. Due to the planet's uninhabitable nature, the Galactic Federation has no issues with Samus blowing up the entire thing, as is her specialty.

Explore two full areas in this mini-hack, filled with interesting items, 6 custom songs (including 2 original compositions), custom graphics, and lots of custom ASM to create a fresh and interesting playing experience.

name: I Won't Slay Dragons for You
description:
Luke and you have been thrown into a world of fear, a maze of his own mind. Help him traverse his inner world.

He can do this.

name: Shtdn
description:
The desktop is peaceful as usual.
In order to delete the computer virus called "Agape", the anti-virus program, Virus Buster "Goyou", must cooperate with it while searching through the computer's files.

name: Rain on Your Parade: Rain on Your DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Freezeframe
description: You find yourself locked inside a museum with just your camera. Explore the various exhibits, complete puzzles, find all the keys to unlock the museums overly-secure front door and escape. If you can.

name: Tofu Escape
description: Tofu Escape is a platformer only for the most agile players.

name: Search All: Potions
description: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the cones / vessels with potions on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location depicts a medieval extraordinary city

name: Devil Should Die
description: Third person shooter game very exciting Includes all enemies in one game and weapons build system arena so you can fight them all at once so have fun

description: Logic platformer with logic tasks with all sorts of obstacles and teleports. Closed doors, assistants can open. The main thing is to remember, they are very stupid, so it is worth protecting them.

description: Welcome to Ghoul Dungeon, a level-based adventure. As you make your way, you will encounter monsters you must fight off. You'll only be able to hit them up close, so make sure you stay agile.

description: Sin descripción

name: Drive Drift X
description: Enjoy this racing game that's easy to pick up and fun for the whole family! Pass around the Joy-Con Controller and compete with up to four players! Featuring a variety of racing vehicles! Choose from cars, bikes, trucks, and even tanks! Transform a range of locations into your racecourse, from town streets to seasides! Find your perfect vehicle and go for your fastest time! Use drifts to take any turn with ease! Increase your speed by charging up boosts during drifts! Floor it and take first place!

name: Menseki: Area Maze puzzles
description: That satisfying feeling that comes from solving a puzzle! Presenting the novel Japanese logic puzzle game that's been attracting attention from around the world! Find your way to the solution, deducing unknown lengths and areas from known lengths and areas.

description: Put on your gloves, stun your opponents, collect your balloons and fly for the win by leaving your opponents behind!

name: Lily's Well
description: It is a rainy night in the Spring of 2005. Lily is left home alone after her Papa put her to bed. She is awoken by a cry for help outside her window. It is coming from the well. Help Lily gather rope to go down the well and save the poor soul trapped down there.

name: Jester Street: Card Counting Trainer
description:
Welcome to Jester Street, England. Hidden from sight, a small laundrette holds a large secret... A unique, sophisticated card-counting machine, intended to help tip the balance back into the 'common' Player's odds.

Avid Player's drop in to test and perfect their Blackjack (card counting): timings, count(s), and amounts. Locals get priority access! 'Come try your skills....

name: Icewords
description: Icewords is a tactical word game where you are a penguin that moves around an iceberg by spelling words out of the letters on the ground. Enemies appear over time, and you must move strategically to force them into the water. Achieve the highest score you can before you are dunked yourself!

name: Y: The Game
description: Y: The Game is a passion project platformer where you are a Y avoiding enemies and spikes trying to get all of the objectives in levels. Perfect for hardcore speedrunners, imaginative level creators, and casual players.

name: Under the Sea
description: Under the Sea is a 3D survival mini game based on time attack, race against time to survive, collect the lights and gain time to live in a world full of enemies.

name: Redaxium
description: First person view. Stat-heavy RPG. Original title.

name: Human Guise
description:
In Human Guise, you, along with FBI agents, will have to investigate a series of brutal murders, find the culprit and put an end to this nightmare. However, the solution may be very unexpected.

A dark point&click adventure where you become Ada Thornton, an FBI agent. She and her partner will investigate a series of murders in a small town. They are both professionals, focused and well-prepared. But don't forget that they are just people, with their own stories, secrets and fears. Get to know the locals, interrogate them and remember that everyone you meet may not be who they seem at first sight.
Investigate the case, uncover the truth, whatever it may be, but remember - you may regret it, this investigation will irrevocably change the lives of the protagonists.

name: Sheltering With You
description: A difficult journey to the East awaits Helena, an orphan, and Aya, a former brothel worker. At the same time, a certain Monster attacks the villages, and Helena sees strange dreams. Will Helena respond to the call of her dreams, or will she find happiness in big love?

name: Syndication Cyberpunk
description: Reclaim your empire as a Sci-fi cyberpunk syndicate.

name: The Slipgate Massacre
description: Remix/remake of the original E1M1 - The Slipgate Complex, but larger and more spacious, with many new and expanded areas.

name: OverKart 64 Christmas Mod
description:
Play as Santa Claus in this new Holiday Mod for Mario Kart 64. You'll need to deliver 100 Presents as quickly as possible by using the Z button to launch them from your sleigh. Your mushroom boosts will help you go faster by using the C-Down button. After delivering 100 presents to 100 houses, the timer will stop.

Help Santa deliver the presents as fast as possible to save Christmas!

description: Paper Mario romhack that adds all the bosses in the game in a single battle

description: Sin descripción

description: In the game, you will control the journey of MC as they try to make their way to church on Christmas Eve. You will run into a series of roadblocks and unexpected changes to your path. As you meet the cast of lonely characters, you will be given chances to make a connection, take action, or simply try to survive the night on your own.

name: Racing: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Microvania
description:
Microvania is a short metroidvania game developed by BluebsTopCat where you play as a wizard where each keyboard button is an upgrade that will give you new abilities to explore the game map in search of a mysterious item.

The game is simple but enjoyable. It has fluid gameplay and reasonable physics for an adventure game. Your goal is to acquire new skills and use them to access new areas that are increasingly complex and challenging.

name: Memory Puzzle: Sexy Fairies
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing sexy fairies hidden under magic symbols which you have to match.

Play as Santa and go to hell and back to deliver presents. Get it before Christmas is over!

description: Sin descripción

name: Wrench to Restore Silence
description: Hand-drawn action platformer. Don't you sometimes want to get away from noise and crowds and just watch night sky? So does this little wolf who took a wrench and build a spaceship which took him to a nice and quiet planet. But suddenly he sees other spaceships are landing on his little planet. Can't they just leave him alone?!

name: Planet Quiz: Learn & Discover - DLC Oceans
description: Sin descripción

name: Dolchio
description: Dolchio is a story-focused RPG Maker game where you play as Dolchio the automaton. Help him make his wish come true in this wintery adventure!

name: Super Metroid: Biohazard
description:
The Space Pirates have leaked a deadly virus on the minor planet Dysnomia, Samus must recover 5 artifacts and put an end to their reckless schemes. Her suit has been outfitted to withstand and protect her from the virus that has begun to mutate organisms on the planet as well as the space pirates themselves. Watch out Samus, the pirates have been experimenting with antigravity technology. Be careful!

This hack was created for the Oats n Goats contest.

name: SantaCorps: Snow Patrol
description: Don the parka and shovel of the SantaCorps' Snow Patrol elf unit in this accessible arcade puzzle frenzy!

name: Lizard Lady vs. the Cats: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Picokaiju
description: You are one big monster with an appetite for destruction. This turn-based rogue-like PICO-8 game is all about that stomping, smashing, grabbing, and chomping your way through a procedurally generated hapless city and its tiny citizens.

name: Pokémon Sigma Platinum
description: Pokémon Sigma Platinum is a ROM Hack/Mod of Pokemon Brilliant Diamond & Shining Pearl to recreate the events and gameplay of a Game Freak-styled Platinum remake, as opposed to ILCA's remakes.

name: Tedd'or
description:
Fantasy action-adventure RPG with an open world and diverse enemies.
Including a complex upgrade system and a lootbox-style way of obtaining new abilities.

The game contains a simple story you can follow to reveal secrets of the world you play in.
Multiple dungeons with juicy rewards you can obtain by putting your skills to the test.

The game also contains a competitive mode where you must defeat waves of enemies as fast as possible.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Malt & Mescal Character Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 all-new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Malt and Mescal from "Flying Red Barrel", as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: I Take Your Hand
description:
All Camille wants is for the mysterious transfer student Osgoode to notice her.

Then Osgoode notices her and she ends up in his basement in chains.

A horror otome about first love in the midst of gore and trauma.

name: Malody V
description: Ultimate music game simulator

name: The Legend of the War Axe
description: The Legend of the War Ax is a real-time, third-person PvP combat. Choose a hero and fight other players in various arenas. Dynamic sword fighting, archery, magic and bombs. Now there are 8 heroes for which you can play.

name: Void Heart
description: Void Heart is a frenetic 2D action rogue-lite platformer with a character development system. You will go through various rooms destroying enemies and collecting items that will help you in the battle against the bosses. Enemies will become tougher with each level you complete. No checkpoints.

name: Nonograms 22
description: A jam packed nonograms game with beautiful pixel art and a slick UI. Over 216 puzzles to solve, achievements and a relaxing audio soundtrack wrapped up in 20+ hours of gameplay!

name: Guitar Hero World Tour: Definitive Edition
description:
Guitar Hero World Tour: Definitive Edition is an expansive mod for Neversoft's Guitar Hero: World Tour release.

While the mod includes heaps of new characters and content, the aim is to bring the engine up to more modern standards and to expand its capabilities. This is done through various internal tweaks, and reverse engineering of the game's file formats.

name: American Man
description: Help a true American hero to defeat the evil forces of foreign countries that took over control of the poor animals, making them turn into frightful soldiers through advanced genetic experiments. That manpower, or rather, "animal power", makes up the most fierce army against a one man army that could ever exist. That one man is known as American Man.

name: Froggy Pot
description:
A super short, linear visual novel about a Froggy chilling a pot.

The pot is warm now, but it will reach a boil soon...

It will be dangerous then...so you try convincing Froggy to get out of the pot, as you both begin to chat...

About meaningless things, mindless things...

Why won't Froggy leave the pot?

name: A Decade Outside
description: they put my sister in the shroud when she turned ten

name: Bloodrayne 1 & 2: Revamped Dual Pack
description: This dual-pack will be sealed with standard editions of both Bloodrayne: Revamped and Bloodrayne 2: Revamped (in their own cases) placed inside of an exclusive slip-cover.

name: Nightout
description: NightOUT game is about two siblings who are staying at the Villa without his parents knowing, then when they sleep at night, his Brother(Andy) is kidnapped by a ghost, and his Sister(Jessica) only realized it when his Brother had disappeared, then the sister finds his brother on the Forest Mountains were very, very dark, suddenly the older was teleported to another world where his sister was in that world.

name: Teocida
description: A surrealistic and spiritually provocative experience. Explore the ruins of a temple filled with puzzles, riddles, and secrets. Follow the Story of the Matriarch: a prophetess whose doctrine fell into obscurity.

name: Toad on Fire
description:
Toad On Fire is a fast-paced, action-adventure shooter, with some RPG and puzzle elements sprinkled in. You play as Smokey, a toad armed with a flamethrower, and take the offensive against an invading force of hostile frogs.

Progress through 25+ levels of varying types, ranging from pure action to puzzle-based to boss battles. The flamethrower is your primary weapon, which can be utilized in many ways, for both attack and movement -- dispatch enemies with volleys of fireballs, or charge up a burst-shot that rockets you forward as a blazing toad-missile of death! Collect loot to purchase upgrades.

Whimsical tone. Anthropomorphic characters. Saucy antagonist. Lots of destruction, explosions, power-ups and secret areas. Boss battles. Controller support. Oh my!

name: Remnants of the Precursors
description: Remnants of the Precursors is a modernization of the 1993 strategy game "Master of Orion". You will play as one of 10 unique races and lead them to galactic domination or, if you fail, humiliation and defeat. Micromanagement is minimal and the gameplay smooth and streamlined.

name: Lost Knight
description: You find yourself in deep dungeon, deep down under castle and you need to find a way up through levels of castle, rooms, catacombs and mush more. You feel that there is an exit... You should reach top of the castle using intersting but in same time simple 2D-platformer mechanics.

name: Trials of Wilderness
description:
You are alone on an island, trying desperately to survive amongst the village tribes of savages.
To do this you need food, water, and shelter. Hunt animals to gather meat, chop down trees to build a base.
However take a few moments to enjoy the beauty of the wilderness and plant crops, breed animals and explore, but don't be to relaxed.
The savages hunt in packs.
